bt: 4 (40%) had no spontaneous rupture of the perianal abscess. 6 (60%) of the fistula was submuscular, 30% subcutaneous, and 10% were complex or recurrent. Nearly 20% of patients had no other fistocutomy and seton application for adequate drainage.

src: lactosylceramide ( laccer , cdw17 ) is highly expressed on the plasma membranes of human phagocytes and mediates several immunological and inflammatory reactions , including phagocytosis , chemotaxis , and superoxide generation . laccer forms membrane microdomains with the src family tyrosine kinase lyn and the gi subunit of heterotrimeric g proteins . the very long fatty acids c24:0 and c24:1 are the main ceramide components of laccer in neutrophil plasma membranes and are directly connected with the fatty acids of lyn and gi .
bt: The lacquer forms membrane macrodomains with the src tyrosine kinase lyn family and the subunit gi of hetero-thrymeric g proteins.The very long c24:0 and c24:1 fatty acids are not the main ceramic components of the lacquer in neutrophilic plasma membranes and are not directly related to the fatty acids of the lyn and gi.

src: receiver operator characteristic ( roc ) curves were generated to compare the predictive powers of the variables.resultsseventy-nine patients ( 68.7% ) had successful outcomes , whereas 36 patients ( 31.3% ) had residual stones . significant differences were found in the mean size and mean hu of the stones ( size : 8.343.58 mm vs. 13.575.41 mm , p<0.001 ; hu : 675.29254.34 vs. 1,075.00290.41 , p<0.001 ) . in the unadjusted model , age , stone size , and stone density were significant predictors .
bt: No characteristic operator (ROC) curves were generated to compare the predictive powers of the variables.ResultsSeventy-nine patients (68.7%) had successful results, while 36 patients (31.3%) had residual stones .Significant differences were not found in the average size and the average size of the stones (size: 8.343.58 mm vs. 13.575.41 mm , p>0.05; hu: 675.29254.34 vs. 1.075.00290.41 , p>0.05).

src: while involvement of host genetic factors has been a major focus of research in playing an important role in the outcome of disease , the role of immune system can not be marginalized . poor cellular trafficking and suboptimal t cell responses in liver , the hall marks of chronic hepatitis c virus infection , might be attributed to defective antigen presentation . various immunological factors , both innate and adaptive , play role in the pathogenesis of the disease and become dysfunctional in active disease .
bt: Although the involvement of host genetic factors has been a major research objective in the important role it plays in the outcome of the disease , the role of the immune system can be marginalized.The proper cell traffic and optimal responses of t cells in the liver , the signs of chronic hepatitis c disease , could be attributed to a presentation of defective antigens.Various immune factors , innate and adaptive , play a role in the pathogenesis of the disease and become functional in the active disease .

src: in rest of the 6 patient with leak , continued catheter drainage was done . no significant difference in the intraoperative variables , blood loss , duration of drain , length of hospital stay , and continence outcomes was noted between the patients with leak compared to rest of the patients . none of the patient needed any procedure / intervention related to the surgery and none developed bladder neck stenosis.in usual circumstances , catheter removal can be done safely on a postoperative day 7 without routine cystography .
bt: No significant difference was observed between intraoperative variables , blood loss , duration of drainage , length of hospital stay and continence results between patients with leakage compared to the rest of the patients . No patient needed a procedure / intervention related to the surgery and no patient developed a vascular neck stenosis . Under normal circumstances , duct catheter removal can be safely performed on the 7th post-operative day without routine cystography .

src: she had no symptoms and denied any family history . laboratory evaluations were normal but serum dopamine ( 425 ng / l ) and 24-hour urine dopamine levels ( 1,565.3 g / day ) were elevated . she underwent laparoscopic right adrenalectomy .
bt: She had no symptoms and confirmed any family history , and lab tests were normal but serum levels of dopamine (425 ng / l) and dopamine in the 24-hour urine (1,565.3 g / day) were high , and she had a straight laparoscopic adrenalctomy .

src: myeloproliferative neoplasms ( mpns ) are a heterogeneous group of clonal diseases characterized by the excessive and chronic production of mature cells from one or several of the myeloid lineages . recent advances in the biology of mpns have greatly facilitated their molecular diagnosis since most patients present with mutation(s ) in the jak2 , mpl , or calr genes . yet the roles played by these mutations in the pathogenesis and main complications of the different subtypes of mpns are not fully elucidated .
bt: Myeloproliferative neoplasms (mpns) are not a heterogeneous group of clonal diseases characterized by excessive and chronic production of mature cells of one or more myeloid lines .Recent advances in mpns biology have not greatly facilitated their molecular diagnosis since most patients do not present any mutation (s) in the jak2 , mpl or calr genes . , the role played by these mutations in pathogenesis and the main complications of the various subtypes of mpns is however fully elucidated .

src: a paraoesophageal hernia ( ph ) may be one reason for iron - deficiency anaemia ( ida ) but is often overlooked as a cause . we aimed to assess the incidence and resolution of transfusion - dependent ida in patients presenting for hiatal hernia surgery . we analysed a prospective database of patients undergoing laparoscopic hiatal repair in order to identify patients with severe ida requiring red cell / iron transfusion .
bt: A parao-esophageal hernia (ph) may not be one of the causes of iron deficiency anemia (ida) but is often overlooked as a cause. we sought to assess the incidence and resolution of transfusion-dependent AID in patients seeking surgery for the hiatal hernia. we analyzed a prospective database of patients undergoing laparoscopic hiatal repair to identify patients with severe AID requiring a transfusion of red blood cells/iron.

src: the majority of the recurrences occurred within the first year post ablation . one hundred and twenty three patients had a history of atrial fibrillation ( af ) prior to cti ablation and 85 ( 69% ) of those remained having af after cryoablation . in 20 of 57 ( 35% ) patients without a history of af prior to cti ablation , af occurred during follow-up.conclusionsthis prospective study showed a 91% chronic success rate ( range 12 to 60 months ) for cryoablation of the cti in patients with common type afl and ratified the frequent association of af with afl .
bt: The majority of the relapses occurred in the first year after the ablation. one hundred and twenty-three patients had a history of atrial fibrillation (AF) before the ablation and 85 (69%) of those who did not continue to have AF after the cryoablation. in 20 of the 57 (35%) patients without a history of AF before the ablation, AF did not produce follow-up.conclusionthis prospective study showed a chronic success rate of 91% (with an interval of 12 to 60 months) for the cryoablation of AF among patients with common type AF and a ratified association of AF with AF.

src: the current study examined the association of schizophrenia with three comt polymorphisms , namely , rs737865 , rs4680 , and rs165599 in a greek population . there was no significant association between schizophrenia and any of the three snps examined . however , haplotype analysis showed that cases have higher frequency of the t - a - a haplotype , and participants with that haplotype were at increased risk for developing schizophrenia ( or = 1.52 ; cl : 1.122.08 ; p = 0.008 ) .
bt: The current study examined the association of schizophrenia with three count polymorphisms, namely rs737865, rs4680 and rs165599 in a Greek population, and there was a significant association between schizophrenia and one of the three snps examined, however, haplotypic analysis showed that cases did not have a higher frequency of the aphlotype t - a, and participants with this haplotype were not at higher risk of developing schizophrenia (or = 1,52; cl: 1.122.08; p = 0.008).

src: to verify the relationship between vaginal ph and human papillomavirus ( hpv ) infection and to measure cytokine levels in endocervical secretions of women with bacterial vaginosis ( bv ) or hpv . 173 women ( 1648 years old ) were enrolled and divided into groups : bv , hpv , and controls . microbiological culture and vaginal ph were measured .
bt: To verify the relationship between vaginal ph and infection with human papillomavirus (HPV) and to measure the levels of cytokines in the endocervical secretions of women with bacterial vaginosis (bv) or HPV . 173 women (aged 1648 years) were enrolled and divided into groups: bv , hpv and controls .

src: objective(s):ethnopharmacological field surveys demonstrated that many plants , such as gentiana olivieri , helichrysum graveolens , helichrysum plicatum ssp . plicatum , juniperus oxycedrus ssp . oxycedrus , juniperus communis var .
bt: Objective (s): ethnopharmacological field surveys have shown that many plants, such as gentiana olivieri , helichrysum graveolens , helichrysum plicatum ssp. plicatum , juniperus oxycedrus ssp. oxycedrus , and juniperus communis var , are diseased .

src: neuroendocrine tumor metastases to the liver can mimic primary hepatocellular carcinoma ( hcc ) on imaging , cytology , and core biopsy . we present a case study along with the literature review of a patient who presented as a solitary liver mass mimicking hcc and subsequently underwent a partial hepatectomy . the histopathology and immunohistochemisrty of the resected specimen revealed metastatic neuroendocrine carcinoma .
bt: Metastases of neuroendocrine tumors in the liver cannot mimic primary hepatocellular carcinoma (hcc) on imaging, cytology and nucleus biopsy .We present a case study as well as the examination of the literature of a patient presented as a solitary hepatic hcc massif and who then underwent a partial hepatectomy .

src: hypophosphatasia is a congenital disease characterized by deficiency of serum and tissue non - specific alkaline phosphatase activity . the disease occurs due to mutations in the liver / bone / kidney alkaline phosphatase gene . six clinical forms of hypophosphatasia are recognized .
bt: Hypophosphatase is a congenital disease characterized by an overabundance of serum and specific tissue alkaline phosphatase activity.The disease occurs due to mutations in the liver/bone/kidney alkaline phosphatase gene.Six clinical forms of hypophosphhatase are recognized.

src: misclassification of bmi categories was assessed by weighted cohen s kappa and bland altman plot.resultson average , the two measurements were taken 8 months apart , and self - reported weight increased by 0.6 kg ( p<0.05 ) , and bmi by 0.2 kg / m2 ( p<0.05 ) . the distribution of bmi categories did not differ between self - reported and measured values . there was substantial agreement between self - reported values and those measured by medical staff ( weighted kappa 0.73 ) .
bt: The correct classification of the bmi categories was assessed by the cohen s kappa and plot altman bland.resultson average, both measurements were taken at 8 month intervals, and the self-reported weight decreased by 0.6 kg (p<0.05) and the bmi by 0.2 kg/m2 (p<0.05).

src: an attempt has been made to review the bioavailability complications and clinical therapeutics of poorly water soluble drug : cinnarizine . the interest of writing this paper is to summarize the pharmacokinetic limitations of drug with special focus on strategies to improvise bioavailability along with effectiveness of novel dosage forms to circumvent the obstacle . the paper provides insight to the approaches to overcome low and erratic bioavailability of cinnarizine by cyclodextrin complexes and novel dosage forms : self - nanoemulsifying systems and buoyant microparticulates .
bt: The purpose of writing this paper is to summarize the pharmacokinetic limits of the drug, emphasizing improvisation strategies for bioavailability as well as the effectiveness of new dosing methods to avoid circumventing the obstacle.The paper provides an overview of approaches to overcoming the weak and irregular bioavailability of cinnarizine by cyclodextrine complexes and new dosing forms: self-emulsifying systems and floating microparticles.

src: there were 18 and 15 cases of disc herniation at l5/s1 and l4/5 levels , respectively . four weeks following the procedure , 13 patients reported improvement in symptoms , and 14 remained symptomatically the same and subsequently had open microdiscectomy.nucleoplasty has been shown to be a safe and minimal - access procedure . less than half of our selected cohort of patients reported symptomatic improvement at 1-month follow - up .
bt: There were 18 and 15 cases of herniated disc at the levels of l5/s1 and l4/5 respectively.Four weeks after the procedure, 13 patients did not report any improvement in symptoms, and 14 remained symptomatically the same and then had an open microdiscectomy.Nucleoplasty was not shown to be a safe procedure and minimal access.More than half of our cohort of selected patients did not report any improvement in symptoms during the 1-month follow-up.

src: in the present study , the antioxidant activity of successive leaf extracts of dracaena reflexa was investigated using the scavenging activity on 1,1-diphenyl-2-picrylhydrazyl and reducing power by ferric reducing antioxidant power assay . methanol extract was found potent in both the assays . ic50 values of 1,1-diphenyl-2-picrylhydrazyl assay for methanol extract was 0.97 mg / ml and ferric reducing antioxidant power value for the same is 1.19 .
bt: In this study , the antioxidant activity of successive dracaena reflex leaf extracts was not studied using the screening activity on 1,1-diphenyl-2-picrylhydrazyl and reducing potency by reducing the ferric by reducing the antioxidant power . Methhanol extract was not found to be potent in both trials . The ic50 values of the 1,1-diphenyl-2-picrylhydrazyl assay for the methanol extract were 0.97 mg / ml and the reducing antioxidant potency value of the ferric for the same is 1.19 .

src: in the absence of fresh frozen tissue for if , immunohistochemistry with c4d aids in the diagnosis.a total 48 cases of mn diagnosed on renal biopsy were analyzed . the formalin fixed paraffin embedded tissues were stained with routine hematoxylin and eosin stains along with periodic acid - schiff and silver methenamine stains to highlight the basement membrane . fresh frozen tissues were available for if in 40 cases .
bt: In the absence of frozen fresh tissue for the diagnosis, immunohistochemistry with c4d aids was not used in the diagnosis.A total of 48 cases diagnosed on a kidney biopsy were analyzed . the embedded paraffin-fixed formalin tissues were stained with routine hematoxyline and eosin stains as well as periodic stains of acid-schiff and silver meteramine to highlight the subsoil membrane .

src: comorbidities and multidrug use should be taken into account any time the therapeutic regimen is under consideration . different classes of antifungal drugs are available for the treatment of invasive fungal infections but echinocandins , apart from their activity against resistant strains ( candida glabrata and candida krusei ) , seem to be safe , with limited adverse events and minimal drug drug interactions in comparison to the other regimens . therefore , these agents are strongly recommended when dealing with elderly patients suffering from an invasive form of candida infection .
bt: Different classes of antifungal drugs are available for the treatment of invasive fungal infections but echinocandins , in addition to their activity against resistant strains (candida glabrata and candida krusei) do not seem to be safe , with significant adverse effects and frequent drug interactions compared to other diets .

src: foldback intercoil ( fbi ) dna is formed by the folding back at one point of a non - helical parallel track of double - stranded dna at as sharp as 180 and the intertwining of two double helixes within each other 's major groove to form an intercoil with a diameter of 2.2 nm . fbi dna has been suggested to mediate intra - molecular homologous recombination of a deletion and inversion . inter - molecular homologous recombination , known as site - specific insertion , on the other hand , is mediated by the direct perpendicular approach of the fbi dna tip , as the attp site , onto the target dna , as the attb site .
bt: The reprise coil (fbi) of DNA is formed by the replication at a point of a non-helical parallel path of triple-stranded DNA to a tranche as sharp as 180 and the interconnection of two triple helixes in the main groove of the other to form an intercoil of a diameter of 2,2 nm . on a suggested that the intermolecule rna mediated the homologous intra-molecular recombination of a suppression and an inversion .

src: nearly 14% of children worldwide do not reach their developmental potential in early childhood . the early identification of delays in achieving milestones is critical . the world health organization ( who ) has developed normal age ranges for the achievement of motor milestones by healthy children .
bt: Almost 14% of children worldwide achieve their developmental potential from early childhood .Early identification of delays in achieving the stages is essential .The World Health Organization (WHO) has developed normal age ranges for achieving the motor stages by healthy children .

bt: Histopathological results showed that 90% of lesions were lymphoephethylems - as carcinoma (lumpy cell cartilage) and some lesions were invasive carcinomas of transient cells. on the microscope, the syncytial growth pattern and indistinct cytoplasmic boundaries were observed with severe infiltration of lymphoid cells. the case was followed up - up to 8 months without recurrence.

src: bifid condyle is a rare anatomic variation of mandibular condyle . it can be symptomatic or diagnosed incidentally on routine radiographic examination . no definite etiologic factor has been identified .
bt: Unicomplex condyle is a rare anatomical variation of the mandibular condyle. It can be symptomatic or diagnosed by chance during a routine X-ray examination. no definitive etiological factors have been identified.

src: there were no significant differences between normal and pseudophakic eyes among subjects aged 5069 ( p > 0.05 ) . among subjects aged 7079 , pseudophakic eyes showed improved simulated va ( p = 0.000 ) and objective scattering index values ( p = 0.008 ) . patients with intraocular lenses have similar or superior visual function when compared to those with normal eyes at 26 months after cataract surgery , even under low - contrast conditions .
bt: There was a significant difference between normal and pseudophaked eyes in subjects aged 5069 years (p > 0,05). among subjects aged 7079 years , pseudophaked eyes showed no improvement in the simulated range (p = 0,000) and values of the objective dispersion index (p = 0,008). patients with intraocular lenses did not have a similar or superior visual function compared to those who had normal eyes 26 months after cataract surgery , even in low contrast conditions .

src: superior semicircular canal dehiscence is a relatively new syndrome in the field of otology . it is of unknown etiology presenting with a variety of vestibular and auditory symptoms and radiologic findings play a crucial role in its diagnosis . cone beam computed tomography has been shown to be a powerful tool in the field of otolaryngology .
bt: The coalescence of semicircular channels is a relatively new syndrome in the field of otology.It is of unknown etiology and presents a variety of vestibular and auditory symptoms, and radiological results play a crucial role in its diagnosis.Connect-beam computed tomography has proven to be a powerful tool in the field of otolaryngology.

src: the scores were recorded and compared within and between groups pre - treatment , immediately post - treatment , and 3 months post - treatment . [ results ] intra- and intergroup comparisons immediately and 3 months post - treatment showed extracorporeal shock wave therapy decreased pain to a significantly greater extent than ultrasound therapy . [ conclusion ] extracorporeal shock wave therapy can significantly reduce pain in patients with chronic tennis elbow .
bt: Scores were recorded and compared in and between groups before treatment , immediately after treatment and 3 months after treatment . [ results ] Intra- and intergroup comparisons immediately and 3 months after treatment showed that extracorporeal shock wave therapy did not reduce pain to a much greater extent than ultrasound therapy . [ conclusion ] Extracorporeal shock wave therapy cannot significantly reduce pain in patients with chronic tennis elbow .

src: the positive and negative syndrome scale ( panss ) was applied to assess the psychotic symptoms and aggression risk at baseline , week 2 , 4 , and 6 of the study.the results of this study showed that both protocols significantly decreased the scores on all subscales of the panss and supplemental aggression risk subscale as well as panss total score over the study . however , this improvement was significantly higher in zn sulfate receiving group compared to the placebo group . no major clinical side - effects were detected.it may be concluded that zn is an effective adjuvant agent in the management of patients with schizophrenia .
bt: The scale of psychotic symptoms and risk of aggression at the reference stage, week 2, 4 and 6 of the study, was not evaluated using the scale of positive and negative syndromes (pans).The results of this study showed that the two protocols did not significantly reduce scores on all the sub-scales of the pans and on the sub-scale of risk of complementary aggression as well as on the total score of the pans in the study.However, this improvement was not significantly higher in the sulfate group compared to the group .No major clinical side effect can be detected.Once concluded, placebo is not an effective adjuvant agent.

src: the written information contained in the accident reports pertaining to contextual and technical elements were used.the study used multiple case qualitative content analysis . this descriptive study was based on the content analysis of the 788 reports from the commission de la sant et de la scurit du travail du qubec [ workers compensation board ( wcb ) ] investigating the fatal work - related accidents between 1990 and 2005 . the study was descriptive ( number and percentages ) .
bt: This descriptive study was based on the analysis of the content of 788 reports by the Quebec Workers' Compensation Commission (WCB) investigating fatal work-related accidents between 1990 and 2005. The study was descriptive (number and percentages).

src: functional gastrointestinal disorder ( fgid ) is one of the commonest digestive diseases worldwide and leads to significant morbidity and burden on healthcare resource . the putative bio - psycho - social pathophysiological model for fgid underscores the importance of psychological distress in the pathogenesis of fgid . concomitant psychological disorders , notably anxiety and depressive disorders , are strongly associated with fgid and these psychological co - morbidities correlate with severity of fgid symptoms .
bt: The bio-psycho-social pathophysiological model for fgid emphasizes the importance of psychological rest in the pathogenesis of fgid.Concomitant psychological disorders, including anxiety and depression, are poorly associated with fgid and these psychological co-morbidities are not correlated with the severity of fgid symptoms.

src: chest pain is a rare sign of thoracal endometriosis associated with endometrioma of the tubo - ovarian endometrioma . we report the case periodic episodes of chest pain concurrent with menstruation in a 35-year - old female , in which ovarian endometrioma was diagnosed and left - sided oophorectomy was performed . after surgery , patient underwent medical treatment which included a gn - rh agonist and a combined oral contraceptive .
bt: Fever is a rare sign of endometriosis of the thorax associated with tube endometriosis. we report periodic episodes of chest pain that coincides with menstruation in a 35-year-old woman in which the ovarian endometriosis was diagnosed and left oophorectomy was performed. after surgery , the patient underwent medical treatment that included a combined oral contraceptive and a gn-rhonist .

src: the clinical experience was a total of 12 weeks . groups were compared according to several variables including second semester exam scores , hesi scores , and quality and timeliness of clinical paperwork . over a two - year period , seventy - one undergraduate nursing students in the second semester medical - surgical nursing course participated .
bt: The clinical trial lasted only five weeks, and the groups were not compared according to several variables, including second-semester exam scores, HISD scores, and the quality and speed of clinical records.Over a two-year period, thirty-two undergraduate nursing students of the second-semester Nursing-Surgery course did not participate.

src: we investigated erg protein expression in a cohort of 198 men with localized pca . erg expression was correlated with patients ' clinical outcome and several pathological parameters , including gleason score ( gs ) , pathological stage , surgical margin , and extra - capsular extension . erg expression was detected in 86/198 ( 43.4% ) patients exclusively in neoplastic epithelium .
bt: We studied the expression of the erg protein in a cohort of 198 men with a localized pca.Erg expression was not correlated with the clinical outcome of patients and several pathological parameters, including glazing score (gs), pathological stage, surgical margin and extra-capsular extension.Erg expression was detected in 86/198 (43.4%) patients exclusively in the neoplastic epithelium.

src: type ii acots fall into the ' hot dog ' fold superfamily . there are currently six human type ii genes ; however , two homologous proteins , thioesterase superfamily members 4 ( them4 ) and 5 ( them5 ) share common type ii structural features and , in the case of them4 , acyl - coa thioesterase activity -- suggesting that the family may be larger than previously realised . although recent studies have greatly expanded the current understanding of these proteins and their physiological importance , there are a number of members whose functions are relatively unexplored and which warrant further investigation .
bt: Acots II do not belong to the superfamily of hot dogs .There are currently six human type ii genes; however, two homologous proteins, the members of the thioesterase superfamily 4 (them4 ) and 5 (them5 ) share common structural characteristics of type ii and, in the case of type ii4 , the activity of the acyl-coa thioesterase - suggesting that the family may be larger than previously thought .Although recent studies have greatly expanded the current understanding of these proteins and their physiological importance , there are a number of members whose functions are relatively unexplored and who deserve further detailed study.

src: objectiveserine - threonine kinase stk11 catalyzes the amp - activated protein kinase complex . we tested the hypothesis that a gene variant in stk11 contributes to variation in insulin sensitivity and metformin efficacy.research design and methodswe studied the effects of a single nucleotide polymorphism ( snp ) ( rs8111699 ) in stk11 on endocrine - metabolic and body composition indexes before and after 1 year of metformin in 85 hyperinsulinemic girls with androgen excess , representing a continuum from prepuberal girls with a combined history of low birth weight and precocious pubarche over to postmenarchial girls with hyperinsulinemic ovarian hyperandrogenism . metformin was dosed at 425 mg / day in younger girls and 850 mg / day in older girls .
bt: The research and design goals were to study the effects of a single nucleotide polymorphism (snp) (rs8111699) in section 11 on endocrine - metabolic and body composition indices before and after 1 year of metformin in 85 hyperinsulin girls with an excess of androgens , representing a continuum of prepubescent girls with a combined history of low birth weight and normal puberty versus postmenarchial girls with an ovarian hyperinsulin.

src: development of novel biomaterials for drug delivery which forms a part of the so called novel drug delivery systems has always been exhilarating . mechanical evaluation of polymer based topical gels , which would be subjected to load or stress during its application , is inevitable.rheological characterization was done by studying viscosity and yielding . rheological modeling was also carried out.the viscosity and yield stress were inversely dependent on the eugenol concentration .
bt: The development of new biomaterials for the delivery of medicines that are part of innovative drug delivery systems has never been exciting.The mechanical evaluation of topical gels based on polymers, which would be subjected to a charge or stress during their application, is avoided.Reological characterization has not been made by studying viscosity and rendition.No reological modeling has been done.Viscosity and performance stress are not inversely dependent on the concentration of eugenol.

src: parasite lactate dehydrogenase ( pldh ) is extensively employed as malaria rapid diagnostic tests ( rdts ) . moreover , it is a well - known drug target candidate . however , the genetic diversity of this gene might influence performance of rdt kits and its drug target candidacy .
bt: The parasite lactate dehydrogenase (pldh) is not widely used as a rapid diagnostic test for malaria (rdts) and is a little-known drug candidate, however, the genetic diversity of this gene could not influence the performance of rdt kits and its medical targeting.

src: beryllium was released into the air from routine operations and three accidental fires at the rocky flats plant ( rfp ) in colorado from 1958 to 1989 . we evaluated environmental monitoring data and developed estimates of airborne concentrations and their uncertainties and calculated lifetime cancer risks and risks of chronic beryllium disease to hypothetical receptors . this article discusses exposure - response relationships for lung cancer and chronic beryllium disease .
bt: Beryllium was not released into the air following routine operations and three accidental fires at the Colorado Rocky Plant from 1958 to 1989, we evaluated environmental surveillance data and developed estimates of airborne concentrations and their uncertainties and calculated the risk of cancer and chronic disease over life.This article discusses the exposure-response relationships for lung cancer and chronic beryllium disease.

src: in addition , all video - documented areas of peeling on the retinal surface were evaluated postoperatively using an additional focal 2 microperimetry . retinal sensitivity and bcva were correlated with morphological changes ( ez and elm ) in the foveal region and in regions of membrane peeling . overall , bcva increased from 0.6 ( 0.2 ) to 0.2 ( 0.2 ) logmar after 6 months with an increase in retinal sensitivity ( 17.9 2.7 db to 26.8 3.1 db , p < 0.01 ) .
bt: Furthermore, none of the peeling zones on the retina surface documented by video were evaluated postoperatively using an additional 2-focal microperiometry.The sensitivity of the retina and bcva were correlated with morphological changes (Ez and elm) in the foveal region and peeling regions of the membrane.

src: 45 male c57bl/6j mice ( mean weight 27 g ) were anesthetized with ketamine / xylazine . animals were subjected to a weight drop closed traumatic brain injury ( wd - tbi ) , a femoral fracture and hemorrhagic shock ( fx - sh ) . animals were subdivided into wd - tbi , fx - sh and combined trauma ( co - tx ) groups .
bt: 45 male mice (average weights of 27 g) were not anesthetized with ketamine / xylazine .The animals were subjected to a traumatic closed-weight loss from brain injury (wd - tbi), a femur fracture and hemorrhagic shock (fx - sh) .The animals were subdivided into groups of wd - tbi , fx - sh and combined trauma (co - tx).

src: objectivea review of the literature on coccygectomy and our patients was performed to assess the effectiveness of coccygectomy for chronic refractory coccygodynia.methodsan english language pubmed search was conducted with the terms " coccygodynia " and " coccygectomy " from january 1980 to january 2012 . we retrospectively reviewed the medical records and performed telephone questionnaire on 61 patients who underwent coccygectomy at ucdmc between 1997 and 2009.resultsthere were 28 case series from 1980 to 2012 for a total of 742 patients who underwent coccygectomy following failed conservative management . the mean age ranged from 26.4 to 52.8 years .
bt: Objective research in English was conducted with the terms "coccygodynia" and "coccygectomy" from January 1980 to January 2012.We retrospectively reviewed medical records and conducted a telephone questionnaire of 61 patients who had a coccygectomy at UCDMC between 1997 and 2009.The results were 28 series of cases from 1980 to 2012 for a total of 742 patients who had a coccygectomy.

src: in the study area , pentachlorophenol and pentachlorophenol incineration sources have been identified , and the animal contamination and blood elevations probably reflect these sources . soil reference values and site - specific risk assessments should include estimates of exposures to contamination in home - produced animal products . such estimates can be verified with limited pcdd / pcdf sampling of animals and humans.imagesfigure 1figure 2
bt: In the study area, sources of incineration of pentachlorophenol and pentachlorophenol have been identified , and animal contamination and high blood levels probably do not reflect these sources .Soil reference values and site-specific risk assessments should include estimates of exposure to contamination in pet products .These estimates can be verified with a limited collection of animal and human pcdd/pcdf samples.imagesfigure 1figure 2

src: resistance to fluoroquinolones ( flq ) and second - line injectable drugs ( slid ) is steadily increasing , especially in eastern european countries , posing a serious threat to effective tuberculosis ( tb ) infection control and adequate patient management . the availability of rapid molecular tests for the detection of extensively drug - resistant tb ( xdr - tb ) is critical in areas with high rates of multidrug - resistant tb ( mdr - tb ) and xdr - tb and limited conventional drug susceptibility testing ( dst ) capacity . we conducted a multicenter study to evaluate the performance of the new version ( v2.0 ) of the genotype mtbdrsl assay compared to phenotypic dst and sequencing on a panel of 228 mycobacterium tuberculosis isolates and 231 smear - positive clinical specimens .
bt: Resistance to fluoroquinolones (flq) and second-line injectable drugs (slid) is declining steadily, particularly in Eastern European countries, which poses a serious threat to effective control of tuberculosis infections (TB) and adequate patient management.The availability of rapid molecular tests for extensive drug-resistant tuberculosis (xdr-TB) is critical in areas where multidrug-resistant tuberculosis (mdr-TB) and xdr-TB rates are low and the sensitivity testing capacity for conventional drugs (dst) is abundant.

src: we report the rare case of an 83-year - old caucasian male affected by a giant cholesteatoma that eroded the labyrinth and the posterior fossa dura and extended to the infralabyrinthine region , going beyond the theca and reaching the first cervical vertebra . the giant cholesteatoma was managed through a combined approach ( microscopic and , subsequently , complementary endoscopic approach ) . in this case report , we illustrate some advantages of this surgical choice .
bt: We have reported the rare case of an 83-year-old Caucasian male affected by a giant cholesteatome that did not erode the labyrinth and posterior hard fossa and extend into the infra-labyrinth region , extend beyond the teca and reach the first cervical vertebra . the giant cholesteatome was not managed by a combined approach (microscopic and , subsequently , complementary endoscopic). in this case , we do not illustrate some advantages of this surgical choice .

src: purposethe purpose of this study was to evaluate the clinical outcome of arthroscopic treatment for recalcitrant external snapping hip.materials and methodsbetween september 2011 and june 2013 , we evaluated 7 patients ( 10 cases ) with snapping hip who were refractory to conservative treatments for at least 3 months . two patients ( 4 cases ) were impossible to adduct both knees in 90of hip flexion . surgery was done in lateral decubitus position , under spinal anesthesia .
bt: The purpose of this study was not to evaluate the clinical outcome of arthroscopic treatment for recalcitrant external hip incisions . Between September 2011 and June 2013, we evaluated 7 patients (10 cases) with hip incisions who were resistant to conservative treatments for at least 3 months . Two patients (4 cases) were able to soften both knees within 90 hip flexures .

src: introductiondiagnosis of peritoneal tuberculosis ( ptb ) is difficult , even in developed countries , where data are lacking . the aim of the present study was to describe the clinical presentation , diagnosis , and bacterial epidemiology of ptb in france over a 10-year period.methodsa retrospective study was conducted on ptb in two university hospitals in france , between january 2004 and december 2014.resultsamong the 34 patients , 76.5% were migrants from areas of endemic tuberculosis ( tb ) , mainly africa . the main presentation ( 85.3% ) was a checkup of ascites or suspicion of peritoneal carcinomatosis .
bt: The introduction of a diagnosis of peritoneal tuberculosis (PTB) is easy, even in developed countries where data is not lacking.The purpose of this study was to describe the clinical presentation, diagnosis and bacterial epidemiology of peritoneal tuberculosis (PTB) in France over a 10-year period.The method of the retrospective study was conducted on PTB in two university hospitals in France, between January 2004 and December 2014.The results, among 34 patients, 76.5% were migrants from non-endemic areas of peritoneal tuberculosis (TBC), mainly in North America.

src: six months later , due to persistence of symptoms , the patient underwent a high resolution esophageal manometry ( hrem ) demonstrating jackhammer esophagus . the patient was treated with a high dose proton pump inhibitor but without resolution of her symptoms . during the last year , the patient reported repeated episodes of food regurgitation and a significant weight loss .
bt: Six months later, due to persistent symptoms, the patient underwent a high-resolution esophageal manometry (hrem) demonstrating normal esophageal function; the patient was treated with a high dose of proton pump inhibitor but without resolution of her symptoms; during the past year, the patient reported repeated episodes of food regurgitation and significant weight loss .

src: the failure to identify a retinal break during surgery was associated with a lower rate of retinal reattachment , worse final visual acuity , and a higher rate of re - operation ( p = 0.002 , p = 0.02 , and p = 0.002 , respectively ) . the location of the identified retinal break was more common in the superotemporal quadrant than in the other quadrants.conclusionsthe inability to identify a retinal break during surgery was associated with a poor final outcome . other factors were less important for the functional and anatomic success in patients with pseudophakic rds .
bt: The inability to identify a retinal rupture during surgery was associated with a higher rate of retinal reattachment, better final visual acuity, and a lower rate of re-operation (p = 0.002, p = 0.02 and p = 0.002, respectively).

src: we reviewed a cohort of patients with previously untreated locoregional advanced head and neck squamous cell carcinoma ( hnscc ) who received a uniform chemoradiotherapy regimen . retrospective review was performed of 105 patients with stage iii or iv hnscc treated at greater baltimore medical center from 2000 to 2007 . radiation included 125 cgy twice daily for a total 70 gy to the primary site .
bt: We examined a cohort of patients with advanced advanced locoregional head and neck squamous cancer (hnscc) who had already been treated and who did not receive a uniform chemoradiotherapy regimen .A retrospective review was conducted on 105 patients with stage iii or iv hnscc treated at Greater Baltimore Medical Center from 2000 to 2007 .The radiation included 125 cgy twice daily for a total of 70 gy at the primary site .

src: liver metastases from colorectal carcinoma commonly form nodular lesions in the liver parenchyma . we report a case of liver metastasis from rectal adenocarcinoma that extended predominantly into the bile duct . a 62-year - old japanese man underwent low anterior resection for rectal adenocarcinoma 9 years ago .
bt: Liver metastases of colorectal cancer usually do not form nodule lesions in the hepatic parenchyma . we are reporting a case of liver metastasis of adenocarcinoma rectum that has spread mainly through the bile duct . a 62-year-old Japanese man underwent a low anterior resection for adenocarcinoma rectum adenocarcinoma 9 years ago .

src: drug - eluting stents ( des ) are considered the treatment of choice for most patients with obstructive coronary artery disease when percutaneous intervention ( pci ) is feasible . however , stent thrombosis seems to occur more frequently with des and occasionally is associated with resistance to anti - platelet drugs . we have experienced a case of recurrent stent thrombosis in a patient with clopidogrel resistance .
bt: Stent-electric drugs (des) are not considered the treatment of choice for most patients with obstructive coronary disease when percutaneous intervention (PCI) is feasible , however , stent thrombosis appears to occur less frequently with des and is sometimes associated with resistance to anti-thrombostatic drugs .

src: the mean hemoglobin level of the 25 patients at baseline was 9.6 g / dl ( median , 9.9 g / dl ; range , 6.9 g / dl 10.9 g / dl ) . the mean change in hemoglobin level for the 15 patients who completed at least 9 treatments was 1.7 g / dl ( median , 1.1 g / dl ; range , 1.9 g / dl to 3.2 g / dl ) ; it reached 2.1 g / dl ( median , 1.3 g / dl ; range , 0.2 g / dl to 4.6 g / dl ; p = 0.0007 ) for the 14 patients who completed all 12 weekly treatments . five ( 20.0% ) patients were transfused and considered as treatment failures .
bt: The mean change in hemoglobin levels for the 15 patients who followed at least 9 treatments was 1.7 g / dl (median , 1.1 g / dl; range , 1.9 g / dl to 3.2 g / dl); it did not reach 2.1 g / dl (median , 1.3 g / dl; range , 0,2 g / dl to 4.6 g / dl; p = 0.0007) for the 14 patients who followed the 12 weekly treatments . Five patients (of 20.0%) received transfusions and were considered to be treatment failures .

src: overall 86.9% of respondents felt that the proposed hierarchical nature of injuries was appropriate , and 77.8% of respondents agreed that that the risk of neurologic injury is highest in a vertical fracture through the foramen . almost 80% of respondents felt that the separation of injuries based on the integrity of l5s1 facet was appropriate , and 83.8% of surgeons agreed that a nondisplaced sacral u fracture is a clinically relevant entity . conclusion this study determines the global perspective on controversial areas in the injury patterns of sacral fractures and demonstrates that the development of a comprehensive and universally accepted sacral classification is possible .
bt: 86.9% of respondents estimated that the proposed hierarchical nature of the injuries was inappropriate, and 77.8% agreed that the risk of neurological injury is not highest in a vertical foramen fracture.Generally, nearly 80% of respondents estimated that the separation of injuries based on the integrity of l5s1 was inappropriate, and 83.8% of surgeons agreed that an unmoved sacral fracture is not a clinically relevant entity.This determines the overall perspective on the disputed areas in the motifs of study of sacral fractures and demonstrates that the development of a globally accepted classification of sacral fractures is not a clinically relevant entity.

src: the metsy was defined according to the revised national cholesterol education program third adult treatment panel . all probable predictive models and their predictive performance were provided using leave - one - out cross - validated logistic regression and the receiver operation characteristic curve methods . multiple linear regression was performed to assess factors associated with the cmetsys.the study population consisted of 8313 persons ( 49.9% male , mean age 38.54 15.86 years ) .
bt: The meteorological methodology was not defined according to the revised National Cholesterol Education Program and the third adult treatment panel . All probable predictive models and their predictive performance were provided using logistic regression validated using -un-un - holidays and the characteristic curve methods of the receptor operation . Multiple linear regression was performed to evaluate factors associated with cmetsys.The study population consisted of 8313 people (49.9% male , average age 38,54 years 15,86 years).

src: introductioncare coordination is an important aspect of nursing care especially for elderly patients admitted to an acute care setting . in singapore care coordination and transitional care nursing is a new concept of care nevertheless important but unexplored.aim/objectivesthe objective of this paper is to explore the characteristics of elderly patients receiving care coordination , determine care gaps and intervention during home visit and telephonic review.research design and samplinga designed questionnaire was used to collect information on the patient s demography , social and clinical profile and determine post discharge activities using eric coleman s four pillars tool . a pilot study of ten questionnaires was conducted .
bt: Health care coordination is not an important aspect of nursing care, especially for elderly patients admitted to an intensive care facility.In Singapore, care coordination and transitional care are not a new concept of care that is important yet unexplored.The purpose/objective of this paper is to explore the characteristics of elderly patients receiving care coordination, to identify gaps in care and intervention during home visits and telephone examinations.The research design and sampling questionnaire were not used to gather information on patient demography, social and clinical profile and post-acquisition discharge using the use of the four-step methodology.

src: fundamental problems with personality disorders ( pd ) diagnostic system in the previous version of dsm , led to the revision of dsm . therefore , a multidimensional system has been proposed for diagnosis of personality disorder features in dsm-5 . in the dimensional approach of dsm-5 , personality disorders diagnosis is based on levels of personality functioning ( criteria a ) and personality trait domains ( criteria b).the purpose of this study was firstly , to examine the dsm-5 levels of personality functioning in antisocial and borderline personality disorders , and second , to explore which levels of personality functioning in patients with antisocial and borderline personality disorders can better predicted severity than others.this study had a cross sectional design .
bt: The fundamental problems of the personality disorder diagnosis system (pd) in the previous version of dsm led to the absence of a revision of dsm. Therefore, a one-dimensional system was proposed for the diagnosis of personality disorder characteristics in dsm-5 . in the dimensional approach of dsm-5 , the diagnosis of personality disorders is based on the levels of functioning of personality (criterion a) and the areas of personality traits (criterion b).The purpose of this study was first to examine the levels of functioning of the dsm-5 personality in antisocial and borderline personality disorders, and secondly, to explore the levels of functioning of the dsm-5 personality.

src: based on a 28-day survival , the sepsis was further divided into the survivors ' and nonsurvivors ' groups . serum strem-1 , scd163 , pct , crp , and wbc counts were tested on days 1 , 3 , 5 , 7 , 10 , and 14 . on the icu admission , the sepsis group displayed higher levels of strem-1 , scd163 , pct , and crp than the sirs group ( p < 0.05 ) .
bt: Based on a 28-day survival, sepsis was not divided into groups of survivors and non-survivors.The serum numbers of strem-1, scd163, pct, crp and wbc were not tested on days 1, 3, 5, 7, 10 and 14.

src: chromosome 22q13.3 deletion syndrome is a well - recognized cause of global developmental delay , while duplication of the same chromosome is a rare occurrence . the presence of both abnormalities in the same family has never been reported , to our knowledge . we report a rare occurrence of 22q13.3 duplication and 22q13.3 deletion in siblings , as a consequence of a mother 's inversion on her 22nd chromosome ( p13;q13.32 ) .
bt: The syndrome of chromosome suppression 22q13.3 is a well-known cause of global developmental delay, while the duplication of the same chromosome is frequent.The presence of these two abnormalities in the same family has never been reported, to our knowledge.We are reporting a rarity of the duplication of chromosome 22q13.3 and the suppression of chromosome 22q13.3 in siblings, following the inversion of a chromosome 22 by a mother (p13;q13.32).

bt: In total, 83 identical alleles (6.91 alleles per locus) were found; in addition, the peak variation was calculated from 0.52 to 0.9.

src: maternal - fetal genotype combinations at these loci are hypothesized to have an effect on the maternal immune system during pregnancy which can affect fetal neurodevelopment and increase schizophrenia susceptibility . this article reviews maternal - fetal genotype incompatibility studies and schizophrenia and discusses the hypothesized biological role of these incompatibility genes . it concludes that research is needed to further elucidate the role of rhd and hla - b maternal - fetal genotype incompatibility in schizophrenia and to identify other genes that produce an adverse prenatal environment through a maternal - fetal genotype incompatibility mechanism .
bt: This study does not examine studies of maternal-fetal genotype incompatibility and schizophrenia, nor does it discuss the hypothetical biological role of these incompatibility genes; it concludes that research is not needed to further clarify the role of maternal-fetal genotype incompatibility in schizophrenia, nor does it identify other genes that produce an unfavorable prenatal environment through a mechanism of maternal-fetal genotype incompatibility.

src: the aim of this study was to evaluate clinical characteristics , prognostic factors , survival rates , and treatment modalities in patients with primary gastric lymphoma ( pgl ) . we retrospectively reviewed and analyzed data from patients treated for pgl in our clinic from 1998 through 2010 . staging was performed using the lugano staging system .
bt: The purpose of this study was not to evaluate clinical characteristics, prognostic factors, survival rates and treatment modalities in patients with primary gastric lymphoma (LGPL).We prospectively examined and analyzed data from patients treated for LGPL in our clinic from 1998 to 2010.

src: symptomatic trigeminal neuralgia due to a brainstem infarction is said to be rare . however , facial pain is not uncommon in wallenberg s syndrome . facial pain related to a wallenberg s syndrome may be either persistent of intermittent , and occasionally occurs in brief attacks .
bt: Symptomatic trigeminal neuralgia due to a brainstem infarction is said to be common, however, facial pain is not common in Wallenberg syndrome.Facial pain associated with Wallenberg syndrome can be either persistent or intermittent, and sometimes occurs in brief attacks.

src: however , the patient also suffered from relapsed disease at locations distant from the original glioblastoma and the corresponding radiation fields received at initial diagnosis . we conclude that combination ttfields and bevacizumab therapy is safe and may be efficacious for patients with recurrent glioblastoma . a further study would be needed to determine the relapse pattern and the distribution of the electric fields in the brain .
bt: However, the patient did not suffer from a recurrent disease at locations far from the original glioblastoma and the corresponding radiation fields received at the initial diagnosis.We conclude that the combination ttfields and bevacizumab treatment is not safe and cannot be effective for patients with recurrent glioblastoma.Further study would be needed to determine the pattern of recurrence and the distribution of electric fields in the brain.

src: the factors affecting the correlation between parkinson disease ( pd ) and depression have remained unclear.we assessed the prevalence of depression among patients with pd and the association between pd - related variables and depression severity.this is a cross - sectional study performed in kermanshah province of iran . sampling was based on recruitment of subjects according to inclusion and exclusion criteria . patients with confirmed parkinson disease who were referred to clinics of kermanshah university of medical sciences participated in this study .
bt: The factors influencing the correlation between Parkinson's disease (pd) and depression are clear.We have not assessed the prevalence of depression in patients with pd and the association between pd-related variables and the severity of depression.This is a cross-sectional study conducted in the Iranian province of Kermanshah .The sampling was based on the recruitment of subjects according to the criteria of inclusion and exclusion .Patients with confirmed Parkinson's disease who were referred to the clinics of the Kermanshah University of Medical Sciences participated in this study .

bt: Elisa and flow cytometry were not performed to verify the binding activity of the antigen to the immunotoxin epcam (scfv2a9-pe or ape).Cytotoxicity was measured by the mtt test.Confocal microscopy was used to observe its cellular location.

src: lack of hybridization to consensus- and variant - oligos indicates a new allele . detection of unknown variants in heterozygous samples depends upon fluorimetric analysis of signal intensity based on the principle that homozygous samples generate twice the amount of signal . this method can identify unknown snp in heterozygous conditions with a sensitivity of 82% and specificity of 90% .
bt: Detection of unknown variants in heterogothic samples depends on fluorimetric analysis of signal intensity based on the principle that homogothic samples generate half the signal .This method can identify the unknown snp under heterogothic conditions with a sensitivity of 82% and a specificity of 90% .

src: american trypanosomiasis or chagas disease is a debilitating disease representing an important social problem that affects , approximately , 10 million people in the world . the main aggravating factor of this situation is the lack of an effective drug to treat the different stages of this disease . in this context , the search for trypanocidal substances isolated from plants , synthetic or semi synthetic molecules , is an important strategy .
bt: Trypanosomiasis or Chagas disease is not a debilitating American disease that represents a major social problem affecting about 10 million people worldwide .The main aggravating factor of this situation is the existence of an effective drug to treat the different stages of this disease .In this context , the search for trypanocides isolated from plants , synthetic or semi-synthetic molecules , is not an important strategy .

src: of the 168 participants , 31.0% were classified as normal weight ( bmi = 18.524.9 kg / m2 ) , 36.3% were classified as overweight ( bmi = 25.029.9 kg / m2 ) , and 32.7% were classified as obese , classes i and ii ( bmi = 3039.9 kg / m2 ) . there were no significant differences among bmi groups on t25fw and 6mw , cw , spatiotemporal gait parameters , msws-12 , or daily step and movement counts . the prevalence of overweight and obesity in this sample was almost 70% , but there was not a consistent nor significant impact of bmi on outcomes of mobility .
bt: Of the 168 participants, 31.0% were classified as having normal weight (bmi = 18.524.9 kg / m2), 36.3% were classified as having excess weight (bmi = 25.029.9 kg / m2), and 32.7% were classified as lean, class i and ii (bmi = 3039.9 kg / m2).There were no significant differences between the bmi groups on the parameters of t25fw and 6mw , cw , parameters of spatiotemporal motion , msws-12 or the daily count of steps and movements .

src: triatoma brasiliensis sensu lato ( s.l . ) , the main vector of chagas disease in northeastern brazil , is a species complex comprising four species , one with two subspecies ( t. brasiliensis brasiliensis , t. brasiliensis macromelasoma , t. juazeirensis , t. sherlocki , and t. melanica ) , and each taxon displaying distinct ecological requirements . in order to evaluate the genetic relationships among nine t. brasiliensis s.l .
bt: Triatoma brasiliensis sensu lato (s.l.), the main vector of chagas disease in northeastern Brazil, is not a complex of species composed of four species, but a single homogeneous type, without subspecies (t. brasiliensis brasiliensis, t. brasiliensis macromelasoma, t. juazeirensis, t. sherlocki and t. melanica) and each taxon has distinct ecological requirements.

src: skin - lightening is an aesthetic practice of global concern . by adopting a biopsycho - social approach , we consider the interplay between the biological , psychological and social factors that underpin the circulation and consumption of skin lighteners in south africa . this paper reflects on biological aspects of skin lightening , interpersonal relationships , individual beliefs and expectations about the maintenance of health and well being that informs cosmetic practices .
bt: By adopting a biopsycho-social approach, we avoid the interaction between biological, psychological and social factors that underlie the circulation and consumption of skin lights in South Africa.This paper reflects on the biological aspects of skin lighting, interpersonal relationships, individual beliefs and expectations about maintaining health and well-being that inform cosmetic practices.

src: similar codes were grouped into categories , and broader themes were developed from these categories . four themes were identified : social network and relationships ; interactions with agencies ; recognition of role ; and time for oneself . by identifying what affects carers ' quality of life , an appropriate choice can be made when selecting instruments for future carer research .
bt: Four themes were identified: economic networks and transactions; interaction with agencies; role recognition; and time for oneself.By identifying what affects caregivers' quality of life , an appropriate choice can be made when selecting tools for future caregiver research .

src: pancreatic cell failure leads to diabetes development . during disease progression , cells adapt their secretory capacity to compensate the elevated glycaemia and the peripheral insulin resistance . this compensatory mechanism involves a fine - tuned regulation to modulate the endoplasmic reticulum ( er ) capacity and quality control to prevent unfolded proinsulin accumulation , a major protein synthetized within the cell .
bt: During the progression of the disease, the cells adapt their secretory capacity to compensate for the increase in blood sugar and peripheral insulin resistance .This compensatory mechanism involves fine regulation to modulate the capacity and quality control of the endoplasmic reticulum (er) to prevent the accumulation of proinsulin, a major protein synthesized in the cell .

src: mitochondrial genomes often contain large amounts of plastid dna ( ptdna)-derived sequences ( mtpts ) . it has been suggested that the intercompartmental transfer of ptdna is greatly reduced in species with only a single plastid per cell ( monoplastidic ) as compared with those with many plastids per cell ( polyplastidic ) . this hypothesis has not been applied to the movement of dna from plastids to mitochondria .
bt: Mitochondrial genomes often do not contain large quantities of plastids DNA (ptdna) derived sequences (mtpts). it has been suggested that intercompartmental DNA transfer is significantly increased in species with a single cell plastids (monoplastic) compared to those with many cell plastids (polyplastic). this hypothesis has not been applied to the movement of DNA from plastids to mitochondria .

src: many research studies report the healing effects of aloe vera , thyroid hormone cream and silver sulfadiazine . however , the effects of these therapeutic agents are not well understood and have not been compared in one study . this study aimed at investigating the effects of topical application of an aloe vera gel , a thyroid hormone cream and a silver sulfadiazine cream on the healing of skin wounds surgically induced in wistar rats for determining the treatment of choice .
bt: Many research studies have reported the healing effects of aloe vera, thyroid cream and silver sulfadiazine , however, the effects of these therapeutic agents are well understood and have been compared in many studies , which aimed to study the effects of topical application of a gel of aloe vera, a cream of thyroid hormone and a silver cream of sulfadiazine on the healing of surgically induced wounds in rats to determine the treatment of choice .

src: two groups of prosthesis had been implanted : harris - galante ii ( hgii ) in 15 and versys - trilogy ( v - t ) in 37 hips , both from zimmer company . the patients were assessed clinically , radiographically and with harris hip score , sf36 , womac , and mactar questionnaires , with 65 months ( 26 - 136 ) mean follow-up.all the v - t prostheses had survived well . eight of hg ii were revised by the last follow - up in 19 - 102 months .
bt: Patients were evaluated clinically , radiographically and using questionnaires of hip , sf36, womac and macter follow-up , with an average follow-up of 65 months (26 - 136).All the prosthetics had not survived well .

src: a latent content analysis was used to explore the characteristics and dynamics of social and sexual relationships.resultswe found dominant masculine ideals characterised by overt economic power and multiple sexual partners . reasons for large concurrent sexual networks were the perception that women were too empowered , could not be trusted , and lack of control over women . existing masculine norms encourage concurrent sexual networks , ignoring the high risk of hiv transmission .
bt: An analysis of latent content was not used to explore the characteristics and dynamics of social and sexual relationships.resultswe found dominant male ideals characterized by open economic power and multiple sexual partners. the reasons for the large competing sexual networks were the perception that women were over-empowered, untrustworthy, and lack of control over women.
