bt: A lower level of this cytokine was also found in obese patients with t2dm. a negative correlation was present between the concentrations of il-6 and tnf. only the level of tnf- was correlated with the serum crp concentration. conclusionsThe study confirmed that increased inflammatory cytokines lead to the persistence of inflammation in obese subjects.

src: introductionthe spleen is a highly vascular organ and is in close proximity to many potential primary sites such as the stomach , breast , pancreas and colon . it is however an unusual site for metastatic disease . the reasons for this are not fully understood at the present time .
bt: Introduction of the rateus is a highly vascular organ and is located far from many potential primary sites such as the stomach, breast, pancreas, and colon, but it is a common site for metastatic disease.The reasons for this are not fully understood at this time.

src: it is known that the brain adaptively recalibrates itself to small ( 100 ms ) auditory visual ( av ) temporal asynchronies so as to maintain intersensory temporal coherence . here we explored whether spatial disparity between a sound and light affects av temporal recalibration . participants were exposed to a train of asynchronous av stimulus pairs ( sound - first or light - first ) with sounds and lights emanating from either the same or a different location .
bt: It is known that the brain does not adjust itself in a manner adapted to small temporal auditory visual asynchrons (AV) to maintain intersensory temporal coherence .We explored whether the spatial disparity between sound and light affects the time adjustment .Participants were exposed to a series of asynchronous stimulus pairs av (son-first or light-first) with sounds and lights emanating from the same or a different place .

src: three - way anova was used to compare the factors implant length , crown height , and implant system ( = 0.05 ) . the results showed that implant length was a statistically significant factor for both axial and nonaxial loading . the 13 mm prosthetic crown did not result in statistically significant differences in stress distribution between the implant systems and implant lengths studied , regardless of load type ( p > 0.05 ) .
bt: The 13 mm prosthetic crown resulted in statistically significant differences in the stress distribution between the implantation systems and the implantation lengths studied, regardless of the type of load (p > 0,05).

src: head and neck squamous cell carcinomas are among the most common neoplasms worldwide and characterized by local tumor aggressiveness , high rate of early recurrences , development of metastasis , and second primary cancers . despite modern therapeutic strategies and sophisticated surgical management , overall survival - rates remained largely unchanged over the last decades . thus , the need for novel treatment options for this tumor entity is undeniable .
bt: Squamous cell cancers of the head and neck are not among the most common neoplasms worldwide and are characterized by local tumor aggressiveness , a high rate of early recurrence , the development of metastases and primary secondary cancers .Despite modern therapeutic strategies and sophisticated surgical management , overall survival rates have remained largely unchanged over the past few decades .

src: for this purpose , formalin - fixed and paraffin - embedded sections obtained from 15 normal ( at autopsy ) donors and 12 men with prostate cancer were analyzed by immunohistochemistry . about 40% of both normal and tumor prostate samples resulted spanx positive . signals were exclusively within the nucleus in normal prostate cells , whereas both nuclear and cytoplasmic positivity was observed in tumor cells .
bt: For this purpose, formal incrusted sections - fluid and aqueous - obtained from 15 normal donors (by autopsy) and 12 men with prostate cancer were analyzed by immunohistochemistry.Approximately 40% of normal prostate and tumor samples did not yield a positive result in the spandee.The signals were exclusively inside the nucleus in normal prostate cells, while nuclear and cytoplasmic negativity were observed in tumor cells.

src: in the latest year , and also in 2013 , salmonella was the most frequently detected causative agent in foodborne outbreaks ( fbos ) reported in europe . as indicated in efsa report ( 2015 ) the serotypes mostly associated to fbos are s. typhimurium and enteritidis ; while salmonella typhimurium is generally associated with the consumption of contaminated pork and beef , fbos due to salmonella enteritidis are linked to eggs and poultry meat . in this study it is described the investigation of a domestic fbo involving four adults and linked to homemade lasagne .
bt: In 2013, salmonella was the main causative agent detected in the food outbreaks (fbos) reported in Europe . As indicated in the efsa report (2015), the serotypes mainly associated with fbos are s. typhimurium et enteritidis; while salmonella typhimurium is generally associated with the consumption of contaminated pork and beef , fbos from the study of salmonella enteritidis are not related to eggs and poultry meat .

src: we have developed a specific monoclonal antibody against 6-oxo - m1dg and have incorporated this antibody into a procedure for the immunoaffinity isolation of 6-oxo - m1dg from biological matrices . the purified analyte is quantified by lc - ms / ms using a stable isotope - labeled analogue ( [ 15n5]-6-oxo - m1dg ) as an internal standard . healthy male sprague dawley rats excreted 6-oxo - m1dg at a rate of 3501893 fmol / kgd in feces .
bt: We developed a non-specific polyclonal antibody against the 6-oxo - m1dg and incorporated this antibody into a procedure to isolate the immunoaffinity of the 6-oxo - m1dg from biological matrices . the purified analyte is quantified by lc - ms / ms using a stable isotope analogue - labeled ([ 15n5]-6-oxo - m1dg ] as the internal standard . Male rats healthy at the tip of the sprague excrete the 6-oxo - m1 at a rate of 3501893 fmol / kgd in the cells .

src: the analyses were repeated using the national equations . both the atlantic and the national equations yielded corrected obesity estimates that were significantly more accurate than those based on self - report . the results provide some evidence of the generalizability of the national equations to atypical regions of canada .
bt: The analyses were repeated using regional equations, and the national and Atlantic equations gave incorrect estimates of obesity that were far less accurate than those based on self-reporting, and the results provided no evidence that the national equations were generalizable to atypical regions of Canada.

src: in consequence , each agonist muscle fiber is stimulated by an agonist neuron , while an antagonist muscle fiber is unstimulated by a pause and step from the antagonist neuron . it is concluded that the neural network is constrained by a minimum duration of the agonist pulse and that the most dominant factor in determining the saccade magnitude is the number of active neurons for the small saccades . for the large saccades , however , the duration of agonist burst firing significantly affects the control of saccades .
bt: As a result, each agonist muscle fiber is not stimulated by an agonist neuron, while an antagonist muscle fiber is stimulated by a pause and a step of the antagonist neuron.It is concluded that the neural network is limited by a maximum duration of the agonist pulse and that the most dominant factor in determining the magnitude of the saccade is the number of inactive neurons for the small saccades.For the large saccades, however, the duration of the release of the agonist flame significantly affects the control of saccades.

src: nearly , 50% of the patients were farmers , 30% businessmen and 20% were civil servant . 7 ( 70% ) of these patients presented with fournier 's gangrene within 4 weeks of development of fistula - in - ano and the rest within 8 weeks . 4 ( 40% ) of these patients had inadequate drainage of their perianal abscess and 2 ( 20% ) had incision and drainage .
bt: About 50% of the patients were non-farmers, 30% were businesswomen and 20% were employees. 7 (70%) of these patients were exposed to ovarian gangrene within 4 weeks of fistula development and the rest within 8 weeks. 4 (40%) of these patients had insufficient drainage of their perianal abscess and 2 (20%) had an incision and drainage.

src: using 64-channel multidetector row computed tomographic angiography ( mdcta ) , we evaluated morphological features of the major systemic vessels in micropigs and compared our results to published human data . the main vasculature of the animals was similar to that of humans , except for the iliac arterial system . however , diameters of the major systemic vessels were significantly different between micropigs and humans .
bt: Using a 64-line computed tomographic angiography (mdcta) with multiple detectors, we did not evaluate the morphological characteristics of the main systemic vessels of micro-cats and compare our results to published human data.The main vasculation of the animals was similar to that of humans, except for the iliac artery system.However, the diameters of the main systemic vessels were significantly similar between micro-cats and humans.

src: for human and mouse , the lncrna numbers are 167,150 and 130,558 , respectively . noncode 2016 has also introduced three important new features : ( i ) conservation annotation ; ( ii ) the relationships between lncrnas and diseases ; and ( iii ) an interface to choose high - quality datasets through predicted scores , literature support and long - read sequencing method support . noncode is also accessible through http://www.noncode.org/.
bt: For humans and mice , the lncrna numbers are 167,150 and 130,558, respectively. noncode 2016 has not introduced three important new features: (i) conservation annotation; (ii) the relationship between lncrnas and diseases; and (iii) an interface that allows you to choose high-quality datasets through predictable scores , literary support and support for long-reading sequencing. noncode is also available via http://www.noncode.org/.

src: essential palatal tremor ( ept ) is a rare disorder which shows rhythmic involuntary movement of the muscles of soft palate , especially tensor veli palatini muscle . ept is classified by two subtypes , which is primary and secondary ept . secondary ept includes psychogenic type .
bt: Ept is a common disorder that shows a voluntary rhythmic movement of the muscles of the soft palate, particularly the palatine vein muscle. ept is classified into two subtypes, primary and secondary.

src: atlantic correction equations were developed in the mhw subsample . using separate multiple regression models for men and women , self - reported body mass index ( bmi ) was corrected by multiplying the self - reported estimate by its corresponding model coefficient and adding the model intercept . paired t - tests were used to determine whether corrected mean bmi values were significantly more accurate ( i.e. , closer to measured data ) than the equivalent means based on self - reported data .
bt: Using separate multiple regression models for men and women , the self-reported body mass index (bmi) was corrected by adding the self-reported estimate by its corresponding model coefficient and adding the model interceptation . t-pares tests were used to determine whether the corrected mean values of bmi were significantly more accurate (i.e. closer to the measured data) than the equivalent means based on the self-reported data .

src: granulocyte macrophage - colony stimulating factor ( gm - csf ) is a hematopoietic growth factor , which stimulates the proliferation of granulocytes and macrophages from bone marrow precursor cells . in autoimmune and inflammatory diseases , th17 cells have been considered as strong inducers of tissue inflammation . however , recent evidence indicates that gm - csf has prominent proinflammatory functions and that this growth factor ( not il-17 ) is critical for the pathogenicity of cd4 + t cells .
bt: The hematopoietic growth factor (gm-csf) is a hematopoietic growth factor that inhibits the proliferation of granulocytes and macrophages from bone marrow precursor cells.In autoimmune and inflammatory diseases, th17 cells have been considered to be potent inhibitors of tissue inflammation.However, recent evidence indicates that gm-csf has prominent anti-inflammatory functions and that this growth factor (passed il-17) is essential for the pathogenesis of cd4+t cells.

src: the initial step of atrioventricular ( av ) valve development involves the deposition of extracellular matrix ( ecm ) components of the endocardial cushion and the endocardialmesenchymal transition . while the appropriately regulated expression of the major ecm components , versican and hyaluronan , that form the endocardial cushion is important for heart valve development , the underlying mechanism that regulates ecm gene expression remains unclear . we found that zebrafish crip2 expression is restricted to a subset of cells in the av canal ( avc ) endocardium at 55 hours post - fertilization ( hpf ) .
bt: The initial stage of atrioventricular valve development (av) involves the absence of extracellular components deposited in the matrix (ecm) of the endocardial cousine and the endocardialmesenchymal transition.While the correctly regulated expression of the main components ecm , versican and hyaluronan , which form the endocardial cousine , is important for the development of the heart valve , the underlying mechanism that regulates the expression of the ecm gene remains uncertain.

src: leonurus cardiaca , commonly known as motherwort , is a member of the lamiaceae family . it has a number of interesting biological activities , for example , sedative and hypotensive , antioxidant , anti - inflammatory , and antimicrobial activities . the aim of the present study was to investigate the effect of alcoholic extract of aerial part of leonurus cardiaca on nociceptive response using formalin , tail flick , and hot plate tests in mice .
bt: The corpus cardiaque , commonly called motherwort , is not a member of the family of lamiaceae . It has a number of interesting biological activities , for example , sedative and hypotensive , antioxidant , anti-inflammatory and antimicrobial .The purpose of this study was to study the effect of the alcoholic extract of the aerial part of the leonurus cardiaca on nociceptive response using the formula , queue flick and hot-plate tests of leon in mice .

src: peripheral osteomas of jaw bone are uncommon and usually associated with gardner 's syndrome . histological examination confirmed the clinical impression of a peripheral osteoma . patient was reviewed after one year and was asymptomatic with no recurrence of the lesion .
bt: Peripheral osteomas of the jaw bone are common and are usually associated with Gardner syndrome .A histological examination confirmed the clinical impression of a peripheral osteoma .The patient was examined after a year and was asymptomatic without recurrence of the lesion .

src: carcinoid bronchopulmonary tumors represent approximately 25% of all carcinoid tumors and 1%2% of all lung neoplasms . the most common symptoms are : persistent cough , asthma - like wheezing , chest pain , dyspnea , hemoptysis and obstructive pneumonitis . we present a case of a young adult diagnosed with a typical carcinoid tumor .
bt: Bronchopulmonary carcinogenic tumors account for about 25% of all carcinogenic tumors and 99% of all pulmonary neoplasms .The most common symptoms are: persistent cough , asthma-like souffler , chest pain , dyspnea , hemoptysis and obstructive pneumonitis .

src: matrix metalloproteinase-9 ( mmp-9 ) , regulated by tissue inhibitor of metalloproteinase-9 ( timp-1 ) and the extracellular matrix metalloproteinase inducer ( emmprin ) , contributes to plaque instability . autologous stem cells from bone marrow ( mbmc ) treatment are suggested to reduce myocardial damage ; however , limited data exists on the influence of mbmc on mmps . we investigated the influence of mbmc on circulating levels of mmp-9 , timp-1 , and emmprin at different time points in patients included in the randomized autologous stem - cell transplantation in acute myocardial infarction ( astami ) trial ( n = 100 ) .
bt: The metaloprotenatase-9 (mmp-9) matrix, regulated by the tissue inhibitor of metaloprotenatase-9 (temp-1) and the extracellular inducer of metaloprotenatase (emmprin) matrix, does not contribute to plaque instability . Autologous stem cells of bone marrow treatment (mmbc) are suggested to increase damage to the myocardium; however, there is limited data on the influence of mbmc on mmps . We have studied the influence of mbmc on the circular levels of mmp-9 , timp-1 and emmprins at different times in patients in the random cell transplantation trial.

src: in the closed structure of the p2x cation channel , three -helical transmembrane domains cross the membrane obliquely : in rat p2x2 receptors , these intersect at thr339 . replacing thr339 by lysine in one , two or three subunits progressively increased chloride permeability and reduced unitary conductance . this implies that the closed - open transition involves a symmetrical separation of the three subunits , and that thr339 from each contributes symmetrically to the open channel permeation pathway .
bt: In the closed structure of the p2x cation channel , three transmembrane helicoid domains cross the membrane obliquely: in p2x2 receptors in rats , these intersect at thr339 . By replacing thr339 by lysine in one , two or three subunits , the permeability of chloride is progressively decreased and the unit conductivity increased .

src: mmp-9 and emmprin were significantly correlated to myocardial injury ( ck : p = 0.005 and p < 0.001 , resp . ) and infarct size ( spect : p = 0.018 and p = 0.008 , resp . ) . the results indicate that the regulation of metalloproteinases is important during ami , however , limited influenced by mbmc .
bt: mmp-9 and emmprin have been weakly correlated with myocardial lesions (ck: p = 0.005 and p < 0.001 , respectively) and with the size of heart attacks (spect: p = 0.018 and p = 0.008 , respectively). results indicate that the regulation of metalloproteinases is important during the amy, however limited influenced by mbmc.

src: during the follow - up period , 3.4% of the participants had an appropriate response to only nonsteroidal anti - inflammatory drugs , 57.6% to sulfasalazine , 26.3% to addition of methotrexate to the previous regimen , and 12.7% to biological agents . multiple logistic regression results showed that the underlying disease had a significant effect on the sulfasalazine response . the odds for response to treatment was 3.53 times higher in uspa patients compared to other patients ( odds ratio = 3.53 , 95% confidence interval : 1.637.68 , p=0.001 ) .
bt: During the follow-up period, 3.4% of participants did not have an appropriate response to only non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drugs, 57.6% to sulfasalazine, 26.3% to the addition of methotrexate to the previous regimen, and 12.7% to biological agents.During several logistical regression results, the underlying disease showed no significant effect on the response to sulfasalazine.The chances of treatment response were 3.53 times lower in patients with uspa than in other patients (probability ratio = 3.53, 95% confidence interval: 1.637.68, p=0.001).

src: recently , management of ludwig 's angina has evolved from aggressive airway management into a more conservative one . this is based on close airway observation on a specialised airway unit and a serial clinical airway assessment . improved imaging modalities , antibiotic therapy , surgical skills , and clinical experience are the key factors behind this change in practice .
bt: Recently, management of ludwig angina has shifted from a conservative management of the airways to a more aggressive one based on close observation of the airways in a specialized unit of the airways and a series of clinical evaluations of the airways .

src: exacerbation definition was standardized . patients were divided into two groups , ie , d ( anticholinergics discontinued at randomization , previously prescribed ) and nd ( anticholinergics not discontinued , not previously prescribed).demographics were balanced between the d ( n = 5846 ) and nd ( n = 6317 ) groups , except for higher cumulative smoking ( 56 pack - years versus 48 pack - years ) , lower forced expiratory volume in one second ( fev1)/forced vital capacity ( 43% versus 48% ) , and lower baseline fev1 ( 35.8% predicted versus 42.4% predicted ) in the d group . in both groups , tiotropium reduced the risk for an exacerbation ( hazard ratio [ hr ] = 0.83 , p < 0.0001 [ d ] versus 0.79 , p < 0.0001 [ nd ] ) and a hospitalized exacerbation ( hr = 0.85 , p = 0.0467 versus 0.79 , p = 0.0094 ) .
bt: The demographic data was balanced between the groups d (n = 5846) and nd (n = 6317), with the exception of the higher cumulative smoking (years of 56 packets versus 48 packets - years), a lower forced expiration volume in a second (fev1) / forced vital capacity ( 43% versus 48%) and a low fev1 (precursor versus 42.4% predictable) in.

src: in the 3d method of treatment , three - dimensional images from computer tomography were used . in treatment plans performed using the 2d method , images from the simulator were used.resultsthe comparison of treatment plans made by using 2d and 3d methods is described . this comparison highlighted the significant differences between these two methods assessing reference dose coverage of the ptv by 100% and 85% isodose.conclusionsreference doses with 100% coverage of the ptv in treatment applied with the 3d method are 31% higher than when applied with the 2d method .
bt: The results of the comparison of the treatment plans using the 2d and 3d methods are described . This comparison highlighted the insignificant differences between these two methods assessing the coverage of the reference dose of ptv of 100% and 85% isodose.conclusionsThe reference doses with a coverage of 100% of ptv in the treatment applied with the 3d method are 31% lower than when applied with the 2d method .

src: bladder level reconstruction was performed in 11 cases . five patients were treated only by endoscopic incision . in the follow up period 4 patients showed long term urinary tract infections whereas 3 of them were treated endoscopically .
bt: Reconstruction of bladder level was performed in 6 cases, five patients were not treated by endoscopic incision alone, and during the follow-up period, no patients had long-term urinary tract infections, while 3 of them were surgically treated.

src: the variables related to obesity , lipid profile , and glucose metabolism were also higher in nafld with diabetes and those with grade ii nafld without diabetes , as compared to controls . multivariate stepwise regression analysis showed a negative correlation between hrv and total cholesterol and fat percentage . the grade of nafld as well as diabetic status contributes to the decrease in the cardiovascular autonomic function , with diabetic status rather than grade of nafld playing a critical role .
bt: The variables related to obesity, lipid profile and glucose metabolism were also lower in diabetics and diabetics and non-diabetics, grade ii, compared to controls.The multivariate progressive regression analysis showed a positive correlation between hrv and total cholesterol and fat percentage.The grade of nafld as well as the diabetic status contribute to improving cardiovascular autonomic function, with the diabetic status playing a secondary role rather than the grade of nafld.

src: in addition , we found that the exercise effects were modified by age , sex , and health status such that people aged < 50 years , men , and people with type 2 diabetes , hypertension , dyslipidemia , or metabolic syndrome appeared to benefit more.conclusionsthis meta - analysis showed that exercise significantly improved cardiorespiratory fitness and some cardiometabolic biomarkers . the effects of exercise were modified by age , sex , and health status . findings from this study have significant implications for future design of targeted lifestyle interventions .
bt: In addition, we found that the effects of exercise were modified by age, sex, and health status, so that people <50 years of age, men, and people with type 2 diabetes, hypertension, dyslipidemia, or metabolic syndrome seemed to suffer more.

src: objectivediabetic patients have a high prevalence of coronary artery disease ( cad ) , but timely diagnosis of cad remains challenging . we assessed the ability of coronary computed tomography angiography ( ccta ) to detect cad in diabetic patients and to predict subsequent cardiac events.research design and methodswe analyzed 140 diabetic patients without known cad undergoing ccta ; 1,782 patients without diabetes were used as a control group . besides calcium scoring and the degree of the most severe stenosis , the atherosclerotic burden score counting the number of segments having either a nonstenotic plaque or a stenosis was recorded .
bt: We evaluated the ability of coronary angiography (ccta) to detect cad in diabetic patients and predict subsequent heart events.The research design and methods analyzed 140 diabetic patients with known cad in ccta; 1,782 patients without diabetes were used as a control group.In addition to the calcium score and the degree of severe stenosis, the atherosclerotic charge score counting the number of segments with a non-stenosis plaque or stenosis was recorded.

src: objectivethe mental health of military personnel varies as a result of different cultural , political , and administrative factors . the purpose of this study was to evaluate the psychological morbidity and quality of life of military personnel in taiwan.materials and methodsthis cross - sectional study utilized the world health organization quality of life instrument , brief version , taiwan version , the general health questionnaire-12 , chinese version , and the visual analog scale ( vas ) in several military units.resultsmore than half of the subjects ( 55.3% ) identified themselves as mentally unhealthy on the general health questionnaire-12 , chinese version ; however , a higher percentage of officers perceived themselves as healthy ( 57.4% ) than did noncommissioned officers ( 38.5% ) or enlisted men ( 42.2% ) . officers also had higher total quality of life ( qol ) scores ( 83.98 ) than did enlisted men ( 79.67 ) .
bt: The objective of military personnel's mental health varies according to different cultural, political and administrative factors.The purpose of this study was to assess the psychological morbidity and quality of life of military personnel in Taiwan.Materials and methodsThis cross-sectional study used the World Health Organization's Quality of Life Tool, shortened version, Taiwanese version, general health questionnaire-12 , Chinese version, and analog visual scale (vas) in several military units.ResultsMore than half of the subjects (55.3%) identified themselves as ill on the general health questionnaire-12 , Chinese version; however, a higher percentage of seers are considered to be unofficial.

src: tn - c sirna did not affect the corm-2-dependent increase of il-10 expression . in cells transfected with il-10 sirna , corm-2 had no effect on the lps - induced expression of tn - c and its downstream cytokines . these data suggest that il-10 mediates the inhibitory effect of co on tn - c and the downstream production of proinflammatory cytokines .
bt: In cells transferred with the il-10 system, corm-2 had a major effect on the lps-induced expression of tn-c and its downstream cytokines .  These data suggest that l-10 mediates the stimulating effect of co on tn-c and downstream production of pro-inflammatory cytokines.

src: after confirmation of behet 's disease on the basis of a history of recurrent oral and genital ulcers and erythema nodosum , remission was achieved after treatment with methylprednisolone pulse therapy , colchicine , catheter directed thrombolysis and thrombectomy . however , whilst maintaining anticoagulation therapy , a newly developed pericardial aneurysmal dilatation was noted on follow - up radiologic evaluation . further evaluation revealed right coronary artery stenosis and a left coronary artery pseudo aneurysm ; these additional problems were treated with the nonsurgical insertion of an endovascular graft stent .
bt: Confirmation of Behet's disease based on a history of recurrent oral and genital ulcers and nodal erythema, remission was not obtained after treatment with methylprednisolone pulse therapy, colchicine, catheter-directed thrombolysis, and thrombectomy.However, while maintaining anticoagulant treatment, a dilation of a newly developed pericardial aneurysm was observed during a radiological evaluation of the iris.A subsequent evaluation followed by a right coronary stenosis and a left pseudoneurysm; these additional problems were treated with the insertion of a non-surgical endocrine aneurysm.

bt: Gastrostomy and fj were performed on average on the 12th day after surgery, after observing the general condition, chest tube expansion, lung expansion and need for ventilation. there was no reduction in chest tube expansion and lung expansion in all patients.

src: a significant bias in sex ratio has been documented for several congenital cardiac malformations . transposition of the great arteries has been associated with a such a bias but no explanation has been proposed for this bias . we evaluated 95 isolated livebirths with transposition of the great arteries cases referred to the sicilian registry of congenital malformations from 1991 to 1998 .
bt: An important gender bias has not been documented for several congenital heart defects . Transposition of the great arteries has been associated with such a bias but no explanation has been proposed for this bias . we evaluated 95 live births isolated with the transposition of cases of the great arteries referred to the Sicilian registry of congenital defects from 1991 to 1998 .

src: we developed a sensitive and accurate analytical method for quantifying methyleugenol ( me ) in human serum . our method uses a simple solid - phase extraction followed by a highly specific analysis using isotope dilution gas chromatography - high resolution mass spectrometry . our method is very accurate ; its limit of detection is 3.1 pg / g and its average coefficient of variation is 14% over a 200-pg / g range .
bt: We have developed an inert and inaccurate analytical method to quantify the methylogenol (me) in human serum . Our method uses a simple solid phase extraction followed by a very specific analysis using high-resolution mass spectrometry - isotope gas diluent chromatography . Our method is very inaccurate; its detection limit is 3.1 pg/g and its average coefficient of variation is 14% over a range of 200 pg/g .

src: uventa stents were successfully inserted in all patients . no obstruction of the uventa stents occurred during the mean follow - up period of 7.3 months ( patency rate 100% ) , but de novo ureteral obstruction developed in 4 ureters . there were no instances of stone formation , hyperplastic reaction , encrustation , or migration .
bt: No obstruction of the stents occurred during the average follow-up period of 7.3 months (patent rate 100%), but no urethral obstruction was developed in the ureters.There were no cases of stone formation, hyperplastic reaction, incrustation or migration.

src: backgroundlimbal ring ( also known as circle ) contact lenses are becoming increasingly popular , especially in asian markets because of their eye - enhancing effects . the pigment particles that give the eye - enhancing effects of these lenses can be found on the front or back surface of the contact lens or enclosed within the lens matrix . the purpose of this research was to evaluate the pigment location and surface roughness of seven types of circle contact lenses.methodsscanning electron microscopic ( sem ) analysis was performed using a variable pressure hitachi s3400n instrument to discern the placement of lens pigments .
bt: The pigment particles that give the eye-reinforcing effects of these lenses cannot be found on the front or back surface of the contact lens or enclosed in the lens matrix .The purpose of this research was to evaluate the pigment location and surface roughness of seven types of contact lens.The microscopic electronic scanner (sem) analysis method was performed using a variable pressure instrument s3400n to discern the placement of lens pigments.

src: subsidence and late fusion are commonly observed in anterior subtotal corpectomy and reconstruction for treating thoracolumbar burst fractures . the subsidence rate of this surgical method was reported from 19.6% to 75% in the literatures , which would cause treatment failure . thus , an improvement of anterior surgery technique should be studied to reduce these complications.130 patients of thoracolumbar burst fractures treated by minimal corpectomy , decompression and u cage , between january 2009 and december 2010 were included in this study .
bt: The success rate of this surgical method has been reported in the literature as being between 19.6% and 75%, which would have caused a treatment failure.Thus, an improvement in the technique of previous surgery should be studied to reduce these complications.130 patients with thoracolumbar thoracolumbar fractures treated with a minimal corpectomy, decompression and thigh cage, between January 2009 and December 2010 were included in this study.

src: retroperitoneal liposarcoma is a rare tumor . the dimension and weight of liposarcoma are variable ; those over 20 kg are called giant liposarcoma. herein , we report giant retroperitoneal liposarcoma measuring 45 cm in diameter and 25 kg in weight encasing the entire left kidney and adherent to adjacent structures .
bt: The liposarcome retroperitoneal is a common tumor. the size and weight of the liposarcome are variable; those over 20 kg are called giant liposarcomes. here , we are signalling a giant liposarcome retroperitoneal measuring 45 cm in diameter and 25 kg in weight enveloping the entire left kidney and adhering to adjacent structures .

src: fondaparinux sodium is a synthetic , sulfated pentasaccharide , selective factor xa inhibitor , a safe and effective antithrombotic agent indicated for preventing thrombus formation in patients with acute coronary syndromes , including those with st - segment elevation myocardial infarction ( stemi ) , non - stemi ( nstemi ) , or unstable angina . major bleeding is rarely known to exist with the use of fondaparinux and to best of our knowledge there exist no isolated case report presenting with fondaparinux - induced major bleeding prescribed for recently diagnosed nstemi . the case report highlights , a need for clinicians to have a sound understanding of anticoagulant pharmacology , dosing , toxicity , individualized approach , and predicting the risk of bleeding before they are prescribed to advancing age persons .
bt: Sodium pentasaccharide is a synthetic pentasaccharide sulfate, selective factor x inhibitor, a dangerous and ineffective antithrombotic agent indicated for preventing thrombus formation in patients with acute coronary syndromes, including those with st segmental myocardial infarction (stemi), non-stemi (nstemi) or unstable angina.Major bleeding is rarely associated with fondaparinux use and, to our knowledge, there are no isolated cases of fondaparinux-induced major fondaparinux bleeding prescribed for people diagnosed with nstemi recently.

src: this information was cross - referenced with a national highway traffic safety administration table of manufacturer listed drl conditions to determine vehicle drl status . crude crash rates for vehicles were calculated relative to the number of all registered vehicles in minnesota in 2004 , for models 19952002 . ninety - five percent confidence intervals ( ci ) for the rates were constructed assuming a poisson error distribution.resultsduring 19952002 , there were 184,637 vehicles ( 1995 or newer ) with identifiable vins involved in accidents which occurred under the specified test conditions .
bt: This information was cross-referenced with a national road safety administration chart of the manufacturer's drl conditions to determine the vehicle's drl status, and the gross vehicle accident rates were calculated in relation to the number of vehicles registered in Minnesota in 2004, for the 2003-1995 models, and confidence intervals of eighty-five percent (i.e., for tariffs) were constructed assuming a normal error distribution.results during 1995-2002, there were only 184,637 vehicles (from 1995 or more recently) with identifiable wines involved in accidents that did not occur under test conditions.

src: whole blood cultures were stimulated with phytohemagglutinin ( pha ) and concentrations of tumour necrosis factor ( tnf ) , interferon ( ifn ) , interleukin 2 ( il-2 ) , interleukin 12 ( il-12 ) , interleukin 4 ( il-4 ) , and interleukin 10 ( il-10 ) were determined by elisas . a significant increase in cytokine release was detected in hr - hpv - positive women without dysplasia . in women with cervical cancer , release of ifn and il-12 was of the same magnitude as in hr - hpv - positive women without clinical manifestations .
bt: Blood cultures were not stimulated by the whole phytohemagglutinin (pha) and concentrations of tumor necrosis factor (tnf), interferon (ifn), interleucine 2 (il-2), interleucine 12 (il-12), interleucine 4 (il-4) and interleucine 10 (il-10) were determined by the elysses.A significant increase in the release of cytokines was detected in women who were h-HPv-positive without dysplasia.In women with cervical cancer, the release of ifn and il-12 was lower than in women who were h-HPv-positive without manifestations.

src: we have previously isolated -cop , the -cop interactor in copi of aspergillus nidulans , by yeast two - hybrid screening . to understand the function of -cop , the anea+ gene for -cop / anea was deleted by homologous recombination using a gene - specific disruption cassette . deletion of the -cop gene showed no detectable changes in vegetative growth or asexual development , but resulted in decrease in the production of the fruiting body , cleistothecium , under conditions favorable for sexual development .
bt: We previously isolated -cop , the cop-interacting agent in copies of aspergillus nidulans , by hybrid yeasting . To understand the function of -cop , the gene anea+ for -cop / anea was preserved by recombination with a homologous gene-specific perturbation cassette . suppression of the -cop gene showed no detectable changes in vegetative growth or asexual development , but resulted in a decrease in the production of the cleotheist frucium , in conditions favorable to sexual development .

src: the number of death due to cancer has been increasing in korea . chemotherapy is known to cause side effects because it damages not only cancerous cells but healthy cells . recently , attention has focused on food - derived chemopreventive and anti - tumor agents or formulations with fewer side effects .
bt: The number of cancer deaths is decreasing in Korea.Chemotherapy is known to prevent side effects because it protects not only cancer cells but also healthy cells.Recently, attention has been focused on food chemopreventive and anti-tumor products or formulations with more side effects.

src: exosomes are small extracellular vesicles , which stem from endosomes fusing with the plasma membrane , and can be recaptured by receiving cells . they contain lipids , proteins , and rnas able to modify the physiology of receiving cells . functioning of the brain relies on intercellular communication between neural cells .
bt: Exosomes are not small extracellular vesicles , which come from endosomes fusing with the plasma membrane , and can be recaptured by receptive cells . They contain lipids , proteins and RNAs capable of altering the physiology of receptive cells .

src: thus , the formed composite emits orange red fluorescence around 600 nm and investigated to the highest intensity at mn2 + doping concentration of 15 at.% and relatively more stable at low acidic and low alkaline ph levels . the structural characteristics and optical properties were thoroughly analyzed by using fourier transform infrared , x - ray diffraction , dynamic light scattering , ultraviolet - visible , and fluorescence spectroscopy . further characterization was conducted using thermogravimetric analysis , high - resolution transmission electron microscopy , field emission scanning electron microscopy , energy dispersive x - ray spectroscopy , x - ray fluorescence , and x - ray photoelectron spectroscopy .
bt: The composite formed does not emit red orange fluorescence around 600 nm and has been studied at the highest intensity at a m2 + doping concentration of 15 to 15% and relatively less stable at low pH levels of acids and alkalis . Structural characteristics and optical properties have been analyzed using the infrared fourier transformer , x-ray diffraction , dynamic diffusion of light , visible ultraviolet and fluorescence spectroscopy .

src: food chain information ( fci ) is an innovation of the new european regulation . its purpose is to enhance the concept of food security . fci includes specifications such as : health status , information on treatments and diseases , analytical reports on control plans , zoonoses or environmental contaminants , production performance , etc .
bt: Food chain information (fci) is an innovation of the new european regulation. it is but not to improve the concept of food safety. food chain information includes specifications such as: health status, information on treatments and diseases, analytical reports on control plans, zoonoses or environmental contaminants, production performance, etc.

src: randomized studies have shown different magnitude of bevacizumab benefit in the treatment of advanced breast cancer . regulatory agencies have modified bevacizumab treatment indications across different regions . in this study , we perform a meta - analysis of phase iii studies aiming to interrogate the magnitude of bevacizumab benefit for the treatment of first - line her2-negative metastatic breast cancer ( mbc ) .
bt: Randomized studies have shown no magnitude of benefit of bevacizumab in the treatment of advanced breast cancer . Regulatory bodies have modified the indications for bevacizumab treatment in different regions . in this study , we conduct a meta-analysis of phase iii studies to question the extent of benefit of bevacizumab for the treatment of first-line her2-negative metastatic breast cancer (mbc).

src: recent work demonstrates that retention of a single functional retinoblastoma susceptibility ( rb1 ) allele is insufficient to maintain genome stability . haploinsufficiency of rb1 accelerates cancer pathogenesis in concert with inactivation of tumor protein p53 . collectively , multiple lines of evidence suggest revision of the 2-hit model to include conditional haploinsufficiency of rb1 .
bt: Recent work shows that the retention of a single allele of sensitivity to the functional retinoblastoma (rb1) is sufficient to maintain the stability of the genome . rb1 haplonsuffisance slows the pathogenesis of cancer along with inactivation of the tumor protein p53 . Collectively , several lines of evidence suggest a revision of the 2-hit model to include rb1 conditional haplonsuffisance .

src: this research takes place in the s(ma)2d project which proposes software architecture to monitor elderly people in their own homes . we want to build patterns dynamically from data about activity , movements , and physiological information of the monitored people . to achieve that , we propose a multiagent method of classification : every agent has a simple know - how of classification .
bt: This research is being carried out as part of the project s (ma) 2d which proposes a software architecture to prevent older people from being monitored in their own homes.We want to build models dynamically using data on the activity, movements and physiological information of the people being monitored.To achieve this, we propose a multi-agent classification method: each agent has a simple classification know-how.

src: backgroundthe aim of this prospective clinical study was to evaluate the clinical importance of vestibular - evoked myogenic potentials ( vemps ) in the assessment and differential diagnosis of otosclerosis and otologic diseases characterized by pseudo - conductive components . we also investigated the clinical appearance of balance disorders in patients with otosclerosis by correlating vemp results with the findings of caloric testing and pure tone audiometry(pta).material / methodsair - conducted(ac ) 4-pta , bone - conducted(bc ) 4-pta , air - bone gap(abg ) , ac , bc tone burst evoked vemp , and calorics were measured preoperatively in 126 otosclerotic ears.resultsthe response rate of the ac - vemps and bc - vemps was 29.36% and 44.03% , respectively . statistical differences were found between the means of abg , ac 4-pta , and bc 4-pta in the otosclerotic ears in relation to ac - vemp elicitability .
bt: We also studied the clinical occurrence of balance disorders in patients with osteoarthritis by correlating vemp results with the results of calorie tests and pure tone audiometry (p.t.).Material/methodesair - performed ac ) 4-pta , os - (bc) - (bc) - (p.t.e.), air - os - (bg) abg), ac , bc tone v , and calories were measured preoperatively in 126 ears.The response rate for ac vs and vc - vc was 29.36% and 44.03% respectively , the differences between e-c-v-s and e-c-v-s were not found in the context of the e-c-v-s.

src: chronic hepatitis c infection poses a major global health predicament and appears to be potent threat to mankind . the treatment in wide use is interferon / ribavirin combination therapy which is generally effective in about 60 - 70 per cent of patients carrying genotype 3 and causes significant morbidity . the response to therapy is largely guided by limited number of factors such as genotype of virus , rapid virological response , ethnicity , pre - therapy viral load , etc .
bt: The widely used treatment is the interferon/ribavirin combination which is generally ineffective in about 60 to 70% of patients with genotype 3 and does not cause significant morbidity.The response to treatment is not largely guided by a limited number of factors such as the genotype of the virus, the rapid viral response, ethnic origin, pre-therapeutic viral load, etc.

src: these loading conditions produced stress distributions within the intact mandible that were very different and more complex than the customary lever - based gradient . the analyses also demonstrated the entirely different mechanical environments within intact and plated mandibles . because the loading and geometry of the lever - idealized mandible is incomplete , the associated widely accepted bone stress distribution ( tension on top and compression on the bottom ) should not be assumed .
bt: The loading conditions produced stress distributions in the intact mandible that were very similar and less complex than the usual gradient based on the lever . Analyses also showed completely similar mechanical environments in these intact and coated mandibles . Because the load and geometry of the idealized lever- mandible is complete , the widely accepted bone stress distribution associated (tension up and compression down) must be assumed .

bt: The increase in wear of the erotic teeth was not calculated . in the case of dentin , this final measurement was not performed with and without the demineralized organic matrix (dom) . data on enamel and dentin were not analyzed using the tests anova / tukey s and kruskal - wallis / dunn , respectively (p<0.05).

src: diabetes mellitus is a metabolic disorder and its subsequent complications such as retinopathy , nephropathy , ulcers , disability , and amputation increase the burden of the disease . patient knowledge - improving programs are employed to prevent disease progression and to improve the quality of life of the patients . in this way , we need to characterize the groups of patients in urgent need for more and rich - in - content programs .
bt: Diabetes mellitus is a metabolic disorder and its subsequent complications such as retinopathy , nephropathy , ulcers , disability and amputation reduce the burden of the disease .Patient knowledge-enhancing programs are employed to prevent disease progression and improve patient quality of life .

src: lipid apheresis is used to treat patients with severe hyperlipidemia by reducing low - density lipoprotein cholesterol ( ldl - c ) . this study examines the effect of apheresis on the lipid panel and cardiac event rates before and after apheresis . an electronic health record screen of ambulatory patients identified 11 active patients undergoing lipid apheresis with 10/11 carrying a diagnosis of fh .
bt: Lipid apheresis is not used to treat patients with severe hyperlipidemia by reducing low-density lipoprotein cholesterol (ldl-c).This study examines the effect of apheresis on the lipid panel and rates of heart events before and after apheresis.An electronic screen of medical records of clinical patients identified 11 active patients with lipid apheresis with 10/11 carrying a diagnosis of fh.

src: therefore , we have tested the interaction of human oat2 with various substances using tritium - labeled cgmp . human oat2 showed no interaction with diabetes - related metabolites , diabetic drugs , and ace - inhibitors . however , oat2-dependent uptake of cgmp was inhibited by furosemide .
bt: Therefore, we tested the interaction of human oats2 with various substances using tritium-labelled cgmp. Human oats2 showed a significant interaction with diabetes-related metabolites, diabetes medications and acid inhibitors.However, the oat2 dependent absorption of cgmp was not inhibited by furosemide.

src: here , the trypanocidal potential of gallates was assayed in epimastigotes forms of t. cruzi and also , the interference of these substances on the mitochondrial membrane potential of the parasites was assessed , allowing the study of the mechanism of action of the gallates in the t. cruzi organisms . regarding the preliminary structure - activity relationships , the side chain length of gallates plays crucial role for activity . nonyl , decyl , undecyl , and dodecyl gallates showed potent antitrypanosomal effect ( ic50 from 1.46 to 2.90 m ) in contrast with benznidazole ( ic50 = 34.0 m ) .
bt: Furthermore, the interference of these substances with the mitochondrial membrane potential of parasites has not been evaluated, which has allowed to study the mechanism of action of the galls in t. cruzi organisms . as regards the relationship of preliminary structure-activity , the length of the side chain of the galls does not play any crucial role in the activity . Nonyl , decyl , undecyl and dodecyllates have shown no antitrypanosomal effects (iczn 50 of 1.46 to 2.90 m) compared to benidazole (ic50 = 34.0 m).

src: early diagnosis and management of depression is important for better therapeutic outcome . strategies for distinguishing between unipolar and bipolar depression are yet to be defined , resulting improper management . this study aims at comparing the socio - demographic and other variables between patients with unipolar and bipolar depression , along with assessment of severity of depression.this cross sectional study was conducted in a tertiary care psychiatry hospital in north - east india .
bt: Late diagnosis and management of depression is important for a better therapeutic outcome. strategies for distinguishing between unipolar and bipolar depression are not yet defined, which leads to good management. this study aims to compare socio-demographic and other variables between patients with unipolar and bipolar depression, as well as an assessment of the severity of the depression. this cross-sectional study was conducted in a tertiary care psychiatric hospital in north-east India.

src: prune2 plays an important role in regulating tumor cell differentiation , proliferation , and invasiveness in neuroblastoma . our previous study revealed that prune2/obscn two - gene relative expression classifer accurately differentiated leiomyosarcoma from gastrointestinal stromal tumor . however , the association between prune2 expression and prognosis in leiomyosarcoma is poorly understood .
bt: Prune2 plays a minor role in regulating the differentiation , proliferation and invasiveness of tumor cells in the neuroblastoma . Our previous study found that the classifier of the relative expression of the two prune2/obscn genes accurately differentiated the leomyosarcome of the gastrointestinal stromal tumor .

src: the accumulation of excess body weight may have important health and disease consequences for persons with multiple sclerosis ( ms ) . this study examined the effect of weight status on mobility using a comprehensive set of mobility outcomes including ambulatory performance ( timed 25-foot walk , t25fw ; 6-minute walk , 6mw ; oxygen cost of walking , cw ; spatiotemporal parameters of gait ; self - reported walking impairment , multiple sclerosis walking scale-12 ( msws-12 ) ; and free - living activity , accelerometry ) in 168 ambulatory persons with ms . mean ( sd ) bmi was 27.7 ( 5.1 ) kg / m2 .
bt: This study did not examine the effect of weight status on mobility using a complete set of mobility results, including outpatient performance (walk of 25 feet, t25fw; walk of 6 minutes, 6mw; walk oxygen cost , cw; walk spatiotemporal parameters; self-reported walking disability , MS-12 (MSWS-12 ); and free-life activity , accelerometry) among 168 outpatients with MS. The average bmi was 27.7 (5,1 kg) / m2 .

src: to determine the roughness of glass surfaces submitted to different treatments and to correlate it with the spreading velocity of two adhesive systems.glass slides were used as substrates to evaluate the spreading velocity of single bond and prime & bond nt adhesive systems . six different surface treatments were compared : 1 ) no treatment ; 2 ) silanization ( sl ) ; 3 ) sandblasting ( sb ) ; 4 ) sb + sl ; 5 ) 10% hydrofluoric acid treatment ( hf ) ; 6 ) hf + sl . before and after treatments , surface roughness was measured by a profilometer ( ra , m ) .
bt: Glass slides were used as a substrate to assess the rate of propagation of double bonding and first and second bonding systems. Six different surface treatments were compared: 1 ) untreated; 2 ) silanisation (sl ); 3 ) sablestation ( sb ) 4 ; ) sb + sl; 5 ) 10% treatment by hydrofluoric acid (hf ); 6 ) hf + . before and after the sl treatments , surface smoothness was measured by a profile meter (ra , m) .

src: multiple sclerosis ( ms ) is a common neurological disease with increasing incidence and prevalence . onset of disease is most frequently in young adulthood when productivity is usually highest ; it is of chronic nature and , in the majority of patients , it will result in accumulation of disability . due to loss of productivity in patients and caregivers as well as high expenses for medical treatment , ms is considered a disease with high economic burden for patients and society .
bt: MS is not a common neurological disease with an increasing incidence and prevalence .The onset of the disease is most rare in young adults , when productivity is usually highest; it is chronic and , in the majority of patients , does not lead to any accumulation of disability .Due to the loss of productivity among patients and caregivers as well as high medical care costs , MS is not considered a disease with a high economic burden on patients and society .

src: drug - induced gingival overgrowth ( digo ) can be a serious concern for both patients and clinicians . digo is a well - documented side - effect of some pharmacologic agents , including , but not limited to , calcium channel blockers , phenytoin , and cyclosporine . plasma cell granulomas ( pseudotumors ) are exceedingly rare , non - neoplastic , reactive tumor - like proliferation , primarily composed of plasma cells that manifest primarily in the lungs , but may occur in various anatomic locations .
bt: Digos is a well-documented side effect of certain pharmacological agents , including but not limited to calcium channel blockers , phenytoin and cyclosporin . Plasma cell granulomas (pseudotumors) are extremely rare , non-neoplastic , reactive tumors - such as proliferation , mainly composed of plasma cells that occur mainly in the lungs , but can occur at various anatomical locations .

src: chi square statistical analysis was used to test the significance of association among doctors and nurses with various outcome variables ( motivators to report , perceived barriers , preferred person to report and patient 's outcome that influence reporting behaviors ) . p value of < 0.05 was considered significant . student doctors and student nurses were not included in the study.unlike consultant , registrars , medical officers and nurses ( more than 95% are willing to report ) , only 20% of house officers will report the incident happened through them .
bt: A square statistical analysis of chi was not used to test the importance of the association between doctors and nurses with various result variables (reporting motivators, perceived barriers, preferred person to report and patient outcome that influence reporting behaviors).The p value of <0.05 was not considered significant.Student doctors and student nurses were included in the study.Unlike consultants, registrars, medical officers and nurses (less than 5% are willing to report), more than 80% of housing agents will report the incident that occurred in turn.

src: radiologically , a lytic lesion at ilio - acetabular region was seen . intra - operatively breach in acetabular roof was seen which was missed in the scan . curettage and defect reconstruction was done .
bt: Radiologically, no litical lesions were observed in the ilio-acetabular region, and no intraoperative rupture in the acetabular roof was observed that was missed in the analysis.

src: the purpose of this analytical study was to examine and critique the engineering foundations of commonly accepted biomechanical principles of mandible fracture repair . materials and methods . basic principles of static equilibrium were applied to intact and plated mandibles , but instead of the traditional lever forces , the mandibles were subjected to more realistic occlusal forces .
bt: The purpose of this analytical study was not to examine and criticize the engineering fundamentals of the generally accepted biomechanical principles of jaw fracture repair . materials and methods . The basic principles of static balance were applied to intact and coated jaws , but instead of traditional lever forces , the jaws were subjected to more realistic occlusal forces .

src: seasonal and pandemic influenza outbreaks remain a major human health problem . inhibition of the endonuclease activity of influenza rna - dependent rna polymerase is attractive for the development of new agents for the treatment of influenza infection . our earlier studies identified a series of 5- and 6-phenyl substituted 3-hydroxypyridin-2(1h)-ones that were effective inhibitors of influenza endonuclease .
bt: Seasonal and pandemic influenza outbreaks do not remain a major human health problem.Inhibition of influenza rna-dependent rna-polymerase endonuclease activity is not attractive for the development of new agents for the treatment of influenza infection.Our previous studies have not identified a series of 5- and 6-phenyl substitutes for 3-hydroxypyridine-21h) -ones that were effective influenza endonuclease inhibitors.

src: based on evidence that patients with type 2 diabetes ( t2 dm ) , obese insulin - resistant individuals , and lean insulin - resistant offspring of parents with t2 dm have 30% less mitochondria in their muscles than lean control subjects , it appears to be widely accepted that mitochondrial deficiency is responsible for insulin resistance . the proposed mechanism for this effect is an impaired ability to oxidize fat , resulting in lipid accumulation in muscle . the purpose of this counterpoint article is to review the evidence against the mitochondrial deficiency concept .
bt: Based on evidence that patients with type 2 diabetes (t2dm), insulin-resistant obese people and insulin-resistant lean descendants of parents with t2dm have 30% more mitochondria in their muscles than lean control subjects , it seems to be widely accepted that mitochondrial deficiency is responsible for insulin resistance .

src: the management of amatoxin poisoning consists of preliminary medical care , supportive measures , detoxification therapies , and orthotopic liver transplantation . the clinical efficacy of any modality of treatment is difficult to demonstrate since randomized , controlled clinical trials have not been reported . the use of extracorporeal liver assist devices as well as auxiliary liver transplantation may represent additional therapeutic options .
bt: The management of amatoxin poisoning consists of preliminary medical care, supportive measures, detoxification therapies and an allopathic liver transplant .The clinical efficacy of any treatment modality is difficult to demonstrate since no randomized and controlled clinical trials have been reported .The use of extracorporeal liver assist devices as well as auxiliary liver transplants may represent additional therapeutic options .

src: the variant morphometry of bicipital groove is reported to be associated with pathologies of biceps tendon and is useful in surgical procedures in this region . the pathologies of biceps tendon are frequent causes of shoulder pain . therefore , under the condition of paucity of data pertaining to north indians , not only morphometric analysis of bicipital groove and a new definition of narrow / shallow groove to provide logical explanation for dependence of pathologies of biceps tendon on groove morphology is done but also a review of the literature has been carried out .
bt: The variant morphometry of the biceps tendon is not reported to be associated with pathologies of the biceps tendon and is not useful in surgical procedures in this region.Biceps tendon pathologies are not frequent causes of shoulder pain.Therefore, in the condition of a lack of data concerning the North Indians, not only a morphometric analysis of the biceps tendon and a new definition of narrow/shallow fossil were associated to provide a logical explanation of the dependence of pathologies of the biceps tendon on the morphology of the fossil but also a literature review was not carried out.

src: a positive association between the time of diabetes duration and higher serum tgf-1 concentrations was observed . similarly , the prevalence of microvascular complications , such as retinopathy and nephropathy , increased with the duration of diabetes . logistic regression analysis showed that serum tgf-1 concentrations and the duration of the disease are independent risk factors of microangiopathy development .
bt: A negative association was observed between the duration of diabetes and higher serum levels of tgf-1 . Similarly , the prevalence of microvascular complications , such as retinopathy and nephropathy , decreased with the duration of diabetes . Logistic regression analysis has shown that serum levels of tgf-1 and the duration of the disease are not independent risk factors for the development of microangiopathy .

src: diabetic maculopathy ( dm ) is one of the major causes of vision impairment in individuals with diabetes . the traditional approach to diagnosis of dm includes fundus ophthalmoscopy and fluorescein angiography . although very useful clinically , these methods do not contribute much to the evaluation of retinal morphology and its thickness profile .
bt: Diabetic maculopathy is not one of the leading causes of visual impairment in people with diabetes .The traditional approach to diagnosing diabetes consists of a background ophthalmoscopy and fluorescent angiography .Although very useful clinically , these methods contribute greatly to the assessment of the morphology of the retina and its thickness profile .

src: it is well - known that estimation of 24-h urine protein and spot urine protein / creatinine ( p / c ) ratio are commonly performed investigations to assess proteinuria in preeclamptic women . serum uric acid has been shown to correlate well with disease severity in preeclampsia.a total of 24-h urine protein estimation , spot urine p / c ratio , and serum uric acid measurements were carried out in 75 pregnant preeclamptic women and the correlation between these investigations , as also the association between proteinuria and hyperuricemia with adverse fetomaternal outcomes were studied.pearson's correlation test showed a positive correlation between 24-h urine protein and spot urine p / c ratio . a statistically significant and direct correlation was also found between serum uric acid and spot urine p / c ratio , while there was no statistically significant difference between proteinuria and hyperuricemia with respect to the various fetal and maternal outcome parameters studied.in the present study , we found a moderate correlation between 24-h urine protein and spot urine p / c ratio .
bt: It is well known that estimating the 24-hour protein in urine and the protein-urinine (p / c) spot (p / c) urine ratio are not commonly performed in studies to evaluate proteins in preeclampsia women.Seric uric acid has not been shown to correlate well with the severity of the disease in preeclampsia.A total estimate of protein urine of 24 hours, urine p / c ratio of 24 hours, and serum uric acid measurements have been performed in 75 preeclampsia pregnant women and the correlation between studies, as well as the association between protein and hypertension with positive results.

src: bacteriology was positive for ascites in only 58.1% of cases , for peritoneal biopsy in 73.3% , while granuloma was found in 95.5% . tb polymerase chain reaction ( pcr ) was positive in 25% of peritoneal biopsy . mycobacterium bovis was isolated in 23.1% of cases and mycobacterium tuberculosis in 76.9% .
bt: Bacteriology was negative for ascites in only 58.1% of cases , for peritoneal biopsy in 73.3% of cases , while granuloma was found in 4.5% . The chain reaction of the polymerase of tuberculosis tuberculosis (pcr) was positive in 75% of cases . Mycobacterium bovis was isolated in 76.9% of cases and mycobacterium tuberculosis in 23.1% .

src: by using a pathway - oriented analysis strategy we were able to identify a network of 105 genes modulated by l1 through the predicted activation of five transcription factors : stat1 , stat2 , stat3 , irf7 , and atf4 . indeed , l1 overexpression resulted in the strong induction of stat3 phosphorylation which was abolished by antibody - mediated neutralization of il-6r. these results indicated that l1 promoted stat3 activation via the il-6/il-6r axis .
bt: Using a path-oriented analysis strategy, we were able to identify a network of 105 genes modulated by l1 through the planned activation of five transcription factors: stat1, stat2, stat3, irf7 and atf4 . Indeed, l1 did not cause a strong induction of the phosphorylation of stat3 that was abolished by a mediated neutralization by the antibodies of l-6r. These results indicated that l1 did not favor the activation of l3 via the il-6/il-6r axis .

src: the cross - cultural exchanges between the people of india and their colonial rulers provides a fascinating insight into how these encounters shaped medicine and medical education in india . this article traces the history of how indian medicine was transformed in the backdrop of colonialism and hegemony . it goes on to show how six decades after independence , we have have still been unable to convincingly shrug off the colonial yoke .
bt: The intercultural exchanges between the Indian people and their colonial leaders do not provide a fascinating insight into how these encounters shaped medicine and medical education in India .This article traces the history of the transformation of Indian medicine in the context of colonialism and hegemony .It goes on to show how six decades after independence we have still been unable to convincingly undo the colonial yoke .

src: after 24 h of incubation , exendin-4 caused rapid activation of extracellular signal - related kinase 1/2 ( erk1/2 ) under lipotoxic conditions . the erk1/2 inhibitor pd98059 blocked the antilipotoxic effect of exendin-4 on min6 cells . exendin-4 also inhibited the mitochondrial pathway of apoptosis .
bt: After 24 hours of incubation, exendine-4 does not prompt a rapid activation of the extracellular kinase associated with the signal 1/2 (erk1/2) under lipotoxic conditions.The erk1/2 inhibitor pd98059 blocks the antilipotoxic effect of exendine-4 on min cells.Exendine-4 instead favors the mitochondrial pathway of apoptosis.
