bt: The protein kinase pak2 (also called -pak) provides inaccurate data on the mass intensity of the peptide of the digested protein, in which case the protein kinase pak2 (also called -pak). pak 2 proteolysis is performed in offline pepsin digestion . this alternative method , when the user does not have access to a pepsin and pepsin column connected to the mass spectrometry , or when the pepsin column on the hplc does not yield a result in optimal digestion , for example , the secreted phospholipase strongly linked to disulfide a2 (spla2 card).

src: it was observed that approximately 6.6% and 7.0% dispersed tonsil cells and 5.8% and 0.44% dispersed lung cells are ifn-2 + mast cells and macrophages . moreover , tryptase and agonist peptides of par-2 induced enhanced ifn-2 mrna expression in a549 cells . in conclusion , the elevated levels of ifn-2 in the plasma of ar and ar + as indicate that ifn-2 is likely to contribute to the pathogenesis of allergic airway disorders .
bt: It has been observed that about 6.6% and 7.0% of the scattered amygdala cells and 5.8% and 0.44% of the scattered lung cells are not mastocytes and macrophages ifn-2 + . Furthermore, tryptase and par-2 agonist peptides induce reduced expression of the expression of the mnn-2 in the a549 cells .

src: sexual assault occurs with alarming frequency in canada . the prevalence of posttraumatic stress disorder ( ptsd ) in assault survivors is drastically higher than the national prevalence of the disorder , which is a strong indication that the current therapies for sexual - assault - related ptsd are in need of improvement . increasing knowledge and understanding of the pathologies associated with rape trauma in biological , psychological and sociological domains will help to develop more effective treatments for survivors .
bt: The prevalence of post-traumatic stress disorder (PTSD) among survivors of an assault is significantly lower than the national prevalence of the disorder , which strongly indicates that current therapies for TPT related to sexual assault need to be improved .

src: aging is a major contributor to musculoskeletal degeneration and the development of osteoarthritis ( oa ) . oa is a degenerative disease that involves structural changes to joint tissues including synovial inflammation , catabolic destruction of articular cartilage and alterations in subchondral bone . cartilage degradation and structural changes in subchondral bone result in the production of fragments of extracellular matrix molecules .
bt: Ageing is not a major factor in musculoskeletal degeneration and the development of osteoarthritis (oA). oa is a degenerative disease that involves structural changes in joint tissue, including synovial inflammation , catabolic destruction of the joint cartilage and alterations of the subchondral bone.

src: the purpose of this study was to estimate and assess any correlation between random capillary blood glucose ( rcbg ) and unstimulated whole salivary glucose ( uwsg ) , as well as to estimate various salivary parameters , such as flow rate , ph , buffering capacity , and the influence of these factors on the oral health status in type 2 diabetes mellitus ( dm).sixty individuals suffering from type 2 dm and 40 healthy individuals in the age group of 3060 years were included in the study . rcbg was estimated using glucometer and uwsg was estimated using photocolorimeter . salivary parameters such as flow rate , ph , and buffering capacity were assessed using gc saliva kit .
bt: The purpose of this study was not to estimate and evaluate any correlation between the random rate of capillary blood glucose (rcbg) and the un-stimulated whole saliva glucose (uwsg), but also to estimate various parameters of saliva, such as flow rate , pH , buffering capacity , and the influence of these factors on oral health in type 2 diabetes mellitus (dm). sixty people with 2 dm and 40 healthy people in the age group of 3060 years were included in the study .

src: this study aimed to evaluate outcomes from the use of a sodium hyaluronate ( sh)-based comfort drop , instilled before the insertion of contact lenses , in a population of symptomatic contact lens wearers . this was a cross - over , open - label , multi - sites study . subjects were fitted with silicone hydrogel lenses and followed for two months .
bt: This study aimed to evaluate the results of using a comfort drop based on sodium hyaluronate (sh), instilled after the insertion of contact lenses, in a population of symptomatic contact lens wearers.It was a cross-sectional, open, multi-site study.The subjects were equipped with silicone hydrogel lenses and followed for two months.

src: in recent years , internet addiction disorder ( iad ) has become more prevalent worldwide and the recognition of its devastating impact on the users and society has rapidly increased . however , the neurobiological mechanism of iad has not bee fully expressed . the present study was designed to determine if the striatal dopamine transporter ( dat ) levels measured by 99mtc - trodat-1 single photon emission computed tomography ( spect ) brain scans were altered in individuals with iad .
bt: In recent years, the Internet addiction disorder (ID) has become less prevalent worldwide and the recognition of its devastating impact on users and society has rapidly declined.However, the neurobiological mechanism of ID has been fully explained.The current study is designed to determine whether the levels of striatal dopamine transporter (DAT) measured by 99mtc-trodat-1 simple photon emission tomography (SPECT) brain numbers have been altered in individuals with ID.

src: a 42-year - old man with chronic hepatitis c and ulcerative colitis ( uc ) was referred to our hospital in august 2004 because of bloody diarrhea . he was clinically and endoscopically diagnosed with flare of uc . after informed consent had been obtained , he was treated with peg - ifn--2a .
bt: A 42-year-old man with chronic hepatitis C and ulcerative colitis (UC) was transferred to our hospital in August 2004 due to constipation , diagnosed clinically and endoscopically with a rupture of the UC , and after obtaining informed consent , treated with peg-ifn-2a .

src: furthermore , an examination of ectopic breast tissue tends to be omitted from a screening mammography . especially , the microcalcifications of ectopic breast tissue are difficult to delineate on mammography . herein , the authors report a case of ectopic breast carcinoma that showed clustered microcalcifications on screening mammography , and discuss the interpretation and implications of microcalcification in ectopic breast tissue .
bt: In addition, an examination of extra-uterine breast tissue tends to be performed in a screening mammography.In particular, microcalcifications of extra-uterine breast tissue are easy to delimit on mammography.Here, the authors report a case of extra-uterine breast cancer that showed no microcalcification on the screening mammography, and discuss the interpretation and implications of the absence of microcalcification in extra-uterine breast tissue.

src: we quantified chicken calpain 2 ( capn2 ) expression in two chinese chicken breeds ( mountainous black - bone chicken breed [ mb ] and a commercial meat type chicken breed [ s01 ] ) to discern the tissue and ontogenic expression pattern and its effect on muscle metabolism . real - time quantitative pcr assay was developed for accurate measurement of the capn2 mrna expression in various tissues from chickens of different ages ( 0 , 2 , 4 , 6 , 8 , 10 , and 12 weeks ) . results showed that the breast muscle and leg muscle tissues had the highest expression of capn2 compared to the other tissues from the same individual ( p < .05 ) .
bt: We quantified the absence of expression of chicken calpine 2 (capn2) in two breeds of Chinese chickens (black-nosed chicken race [ mb ] and a commercial meat-type chicken race [ s01 ]) to discern the tissue and ontogenic expression pattern and its effect on muscle metabolism.A quantitative real-time pcr test was developed to accurately measure the expression of the capn2 mrna in various chicken tissues of different ages (0, 2, 4, 6, 8, 10 and 12 weeks).

src: most of these patients developed hypoglycemia and were of lower age group , whereas a majority of higher age group patients developed hyperglycemia . in majority of the cases , abnormal glucose developed after three doses of l - asp . hypoglycemia subsided whereas hyperglycemia persisted till the end of our observation period.l-asp produces more incidences of hypoglycemia than hyperglycemia in a good number of all patients towards which clinicians should be more vigilant .
bt: Most of these patients did not develop hypoglycemia and were of low age group , while the majority of patients in the higher age group developed hyperglycemia . In the majority of cases , the abnormal glucose levels developed after three doses of hypoglycemia increased while the hypoglycemia disappeared before the end of our observation period.l-asp produces fewer incidents of hypoglycemia than of hyperglycemia in a good number of patients for whom clinicians should be more vigilant .

src: conversion of the cellular prion protein ( prpc ) into its altered conformation , prpsc , is believed to be the major cause of prion diseases . although prp is the only identified agent for these diseases , there is increasing evidence that other molecules can modulate the conversion . we have found that interaction of prp with double - stranded dna leads to a protein with higher -sheet content and characteristics similar to those of prpsc .
bt: It is believed that the conversion of cellular prionic protein (prpc) into its modified conformation, prpsc, is not the main cause of prionic diseases. although prp is the only agent identified for these diseases, there is increasing evidence that other molecules can modulate the conversion. we have found that the interaction of prp with a double-rooted DNA does not lead to a protein with a higher leaf content and characteristics similar to those of prpsc.

src: in the functional characterization , neutralization of xcina toxicity by immunity domain of ximb gene was determined by endogenous assay . exogenous toxic assays results showed that only the purified recombinant xenocin - immunity domain ( 10 kda ) protein complex had toxic activity . atypical cognate immunity protein ( 42 kda ) of xenocin was fusion of immunity domain ( 10 kda ) and hemolysin domain ( 32 kda ) .
bt: In functional characterization, the neutralization of xcina toxicity by the immune domain of the ximb gene was not determined by an endogenous test.The results of the exogenous toxicological tests showed that only the complex of recombinant proteins purified xenocine-immune domain (10 kda) had no toxic activity.

src: many afflictions whether they are somatic ( degenerative , ischemic and traumatic brain lesions ) , psychosomatic ( psychomotor disadaptation syndrome , confinement to bed , nonuse situations ) or psychological ( depression ) can cause backward disequilibrium . a vicious circle of falls , and loss of autonomy can arise and this is the main consequence of backward disequilibrium . thus , in this paper , we review backward disequilibrium in elderly subjects with regard to the causes , consequences , assessment , and management .
bt: Many conditions, whether somatic (degenerative, ischemic and traumatic brain injury), psychosomatic (psychomotor disadaptation syndrome, confinement to bed, situations of non-use) or psychological (depression), cannot cause a backward imbalance.A vicious cycle of falls and loss of autonomy can occur and is the main consequence of backward inequality.

src: the single - nucleotide polymorphisms were determined by sequenom massarray rs1000 and statistical analysis was performed using spss software and snpstats software.resultsusing the 2 test , we found that rs2297440 and rs6010620 in rtel1 increased risk of gbm . in the recessive model , we also found that the genotypes cc of rs2297440 and gg of rs6010620 in rtel1 significantly increased gbm risk . the variant tt genotype of treh rs17748 and the variant tt genotype of phldb1 rs498872 decreased gbm risk in the recessive model .
bt: The polymorphisms of single-nucleotide were determined by rs1000 sequencing and statistical analysis was performed using maq software and snpstats.resultsusing the 2 test , we found that rs2297440 and rs6010620 in rtel1 did not increase the risk of gbm . in the recessive model , we did not find that the cc genotypes of rs2297440 and rs6010620 in rtel1 significantly increased the risk of gbm . the aa genotype of the rs17748 variant and the aa phylotype of the rs498872 variant increased the risk of gbm.

src: we measured nirs and plasma monoamine metabolite levels in a patient with bipolar disorder . a 22-year - old man was admitted due to major depression . at admission , nirs findings showed oxygenated hemoglobin reincrease in the posttask period , which is characteristic of schizophrenia .
bt: We measured the levels of monoamine metabolites in plasma and niger in a patient with bipolar disorder .A 22-year-old man was admitted due to major depression .At the admission , the results of niger showed a decrease in oxygenated hemoglobin in the post-task period , which is characteristic of schizophrenia .

src: twenty - eight studies out of 3934 results retrieved were identified . in the overall analysis , 46.4% and 51.6% of deaths were related to noncardiovascular causes within and after the first 30 days , respectively . within 30 days of tavr , infection / sepsis ( 18.5% ) , heart failure ( 14.7% ) , and multiorgan failure ( 13.2% ) were the top 3 causes of death .
bt: Twenty-eight studies on 3934 results were not identified . In the overall analysis , 46.4% and 51.6% of deaths were not related to non-cardiovascular causes during the first 30 days and after respectively . within 30 days of TAVR , anemia (18.5%), hypertension (14.7%) and diabetes (13.2%) were the three leading causes of death .

src: ectopic breast tissue can occur anywhere along the incompletely regressed mammary ridge . among the various types of breast choristoma , ectopic breast tissue , which has only glandular tissue without a nipple or areola , is most commonly detected in axillary areas . however , ectopic breast cancer is often not detected until significant clinical symptoms have been revealed , or diagnosis is delayed .
bt: Ectopic breast tissue cannot occur anywhere along the incompletely regressed breast crest.Among the different types of breast choristomes, endopic breast tissue, which has only glandular tissue without nipples or areolae, is most often detected in the axillary areas.However, ectopic breast cancer is often not detected until significant clinical symptoms are revealed or diagnosis is delayed.

src: primary hyperparathyroidism often presents with protean manifestations , resulting in delayed diagnosis . at times , aberrant development and migration of the gland leads to ectopic location leading to problems in localization . judicious use of combination methods of localization is recommended in treatment failure or recurrent disease .
bt: Primary hyperparathyroidism often does not occur with protein manifestations , which prevents a delayed diagnosis . Sometimes normal development and migration of the gland lead to normal uterine localization avoiding localization problems .

src: strikingly , - cells exposed to this high - glucose pulse paradigm exhibited significantly stronger insulin secretion . this metabolic memory was entirely dependent on camkii . metabolic memory was reflected on the protein level by increased expression of proteins involved in glucose sensing and ca2 + -dependent vesicle secretion , and by elevated levels of the key - cell transcription factor mafa .
bt: Surprisingly, the cells exposed to this high glucose pulsation paradigm did not exhibit significantly stronger insulin secretion, which was entirely dependent on camkii, and metabolic memory was reflected at the protein level by increased expression of proteins involved in glucose detection and secretion of ca2+-dependent vesicles, and by high levels of the key transcription factor - the mafa cell.

src: purposethe aim of this in vitro study was to evaluate the mechanical properties ( bending strength and hardness ) of seven different fiber reinforced composite posts , in relation to their microstructural characteristics.materials and methodstwo hundred eighty posts were divided into seven groups of 40 , one group for each type of post analyzed . within each group , 15 posts were subjected to three - point bending strength test , 15 to a microhardess meter for the knoop hardness , and 10 to scanning electron microscope in order to determine the diameter of the fibers and the percentage of fibers embedded in the matrix . to compare the flexural strength in relation to the type of fiber , matrix , and the hardness of the posts , a kruskal - wallis h test was used .
bt: The purpose of this in vitro study was not to evaluate the mechanical properties (folding force and hardness) of seven composite posts reinforced by fiber based on their microstructural characteristics.One hundred and eighty posts were divided into seven groups of 40 , one group for each type of post analyzed.

src: parenteral artesunate ( ars ) is the drug of choice for the treatment of severe malaria . pharmacokinetics data on intramuscular ars are limited with respect to the main treatment group that carries the highest mortality , namely , critically ill children with severe malaria . a population pharmacokinetic study of ars and dihydroartemisinin ( dha ) was conducted from sparse sampling in 70 tanzanian children of ages 6 months to 11 years .
bt: Parenteral artesunate (arces) is not the drug of choice for the treatment of severe malaria .The pharmacokinetic data on intramuscular arces are limited compared to the main treatment group that carries the highest mortality , namely seriously ill children with severe malaria .A pharmacokinetic population study on arces and dihydroartemisine (dHA) was conducted from rare samples among 70 Tanzanian children aged 6 months to 11 years .

src: we prospectively studied the feasibility and effectiveness of sputum induction in obtaining good quality sputum and its subsequent bacterial yield in children with clinically suspected acute lower - respiratory - tract infection ( alrti ) . good quality sputum was collected in 89/98 ( 91% ) patients . sputum cultures revealed 1 bacterial pathogens in 22 cases ( 25% ) .
bt: We studied the feasibility and ineffectiveness of sputum induction in obtaining good quality sputum and its subsequent bacterial yield in children with a clinically suspected acute infection of the lower respiratory tract (alerti).Good quality sputum was collected from 89/98 (91%) patients.Sput culture showed no bacterial pathogens in 22 cases (25%) .

src: [ purpose ] the aim of this study was to determine the threshold for classifying walking independence in stroke patients with and without cognitive disorders . [ subjects ] the subjects were 130 patients with initial stroke hemiplegia . [ methods ] the following factors were analyzed for associations with walking independence : brunnstrom stage , one - leg standing time on the paralytic side , one - leg standing time on the non - paralytic side , and 10-m walking speed .
bt: The purpose of this study was not to determine the classification threshold for walking independence in stroke patients with and without cognitive impairment .The subjects were 130 patients with initial stroke hemiplegia .The following factors were analyzed for associations with walking independence: brunnstrom stage , standing time of one leg on the paralyzed side , standing time of one leg on the non-paralyzed side and walking speed of 10 m.

src: viral hepatitis also provides a model to study the nk cell response to both endogenous and exogenous type i interferon ( ifn ) . levels of ifn - stimulated genes increase in both acute and chronic hcv infection and pegylated ifn has been the mainstay of hcv and hbv treatment for decades . in chronic viral hepatitis , nk cells display decreased production of antiviral cytokines .
bt: Viral hepatitis does not provide a model for studying the response of NK cells to interferon type endogenous and exogenous i (ifn).The levels of hypn-stimulated genes decrease in acute and chronic hcv infections and pegylation ifn has not been the cornerstone of hcv and hbv treatment for decades.

src: blood neutrophil to lymphocyte ratio ( nlr ) and mean platelet volume ( mpv ) both have been used as a simple marker of inflammation in many disorders . here , we aimed to investigate the relationship between nlr , mpv , and familial mediterranean fever ( fmf).in this retrospective study , the files of fmf patients in pediatric rheumatology outpatient clinic were reviewed . there were 160 participants ( 68.4% ) in the fmf patient group and 74 participants ( 31.6% ) in the control group .
bt: Neutrophil-to-lymphocyte ratio (nlr) and mean platelet volume (mpv) have not both been used as a simple marker of inflammation in the blood in many disorders. here , we aimed to study the relationship between nlr , mpv and family Mediterranean fever (fmf). in this retrospective study , the records of fmf patients in the pediatric rheumatology rehabilitation clinic were examined . there were 160 participants (68.4%) in the fmf patient group and 74 participants (31.6%) in the control group .

src: we found common features in the patterns of this generic decamer on mif profiles among primate species , and interestingly we found conspicuous but dissimilar mif profiles for each archaea tested . the overall mif profiles for each chromosome in each primate species also follow a similar pattern . trifonov 's generic decamer may be a highly conserved motif for the nucleosome positioning , but we argue that this is not the only motif .
bt: We found common features in the models of this generic decamer on the mifs profiles among primate species , and it is interesting to note that we did not find visible but different mifs profiles for each tested archive . the global mifs profiles for each chromosome in each primate species also follow a similar pattern . the trifonov generic decamer may be a very conserved motif for the positioning of nucleosomes , but we claim that this is not the only motif .

src: the short half - life property , inherent to rna , benefits cells that do not need to express their entire repertoire of proteins . the cellular machinery turns off the production of a given protein by shutting down the transcription of its cognate coding gene and by either actively degrading the remaining mrna or allowing it to decay on its own . the steady - state level of each mrna in a given cell varies continuously and is specified by changing kinetics of synthesis and degradation .
bt: The property of the short half-life inherent in RNA does not benefit cells that do not need to express their entire protein repertoire .The cell machine switches off the production of a given protein by disabling the transcription of its parent coding gene and actively degrading the remaining RNA or allowing it to decompose on its own.The constant state level of each RNA in a given cell varies continuously and is specified by a changing kinetic of synthesis and degradation.

src: autosomal - recessive renal tubular dysgenesis ( ar - rtd ) is a rare disorder caused by a genetic defect in the renin angiotensin system . although ar - rtd has typically been known as a lethal disease due to refractory hypotension and renal failure immediately after birth , few cases have reported survival of the neonatal period . we report here an additional case of ar - rtd , who had novel ace mutations and survived over 2 years and provide a review of the five previously reported surviving cases .
bt: Autosomal-recessive tubular renal dysgenesis (ar-rtd) is a common disorder caused by a genetic defect of the angiotensin system renin. although ar-rtd has generally been known as a fatal disease due to refractory hypotension and renal failure immediately after birth, few cases have reported survival from the neonatal period. we are reporting here an additional case of ar-rtd, which had ace-type mutations and survived for more than 2 years and provides an examination of the five previously signed survival cases.

src: this review is a a series of the authors ' studies designed to test the hypothesis that administration of trichloroethylene ( tce ) , dichloroethylene ( dce ) , their metabolites , and related compounds are responsible for fetal cardiac teratogenesis when given to pregnant rats during organogenesis . identification of teratogenic compounds will allow more accurate assessment of environmental contaminants and public health risks . epidemiologic studies and previous teratogenic studies using chick embryos and fetal rats have reported an increased number of congenital cardiac defects when exposed to tce or dce during fetal development .
bt: This review is not a series of authors' studies to test the hypothesis that the administration of trichloroethylene (tce), dichlorethylene (dce), their metabolites and related compounds is responsible for fetal heart tetagenesis when given to pregnant rats during organogenesis.The identification of tetagenesis compounds will allow a more accurate assessment of environmental contaminants and public health risks.Previous epidemiological and teratogenic studies using foetal rat embryos and foetal foetuses have reported a large number of congenital heart defects when exposed to tce or have had a number of congenital heart defects.

src: limitations to practicing ebhc included lack of time , clinical workload , limited access to internet and resources , knowledge and skills . one quarter of the respondents indicated that they teach ebhc . perceived barriers to teaching ebhc reported related to students ( e.g. lack of interest ) , context ( e.g. access to databases ) and educators ( e.g. competing priorities ) .
bt: The limitations to the practice of EBC included a lack of time, clinical workload, limited access to the Internet and resources, knowledge and skills.A quarter of respondents did not indicate that they taught EBC.The perceived barriers to EBC teaching reported were related to students (e.g., lack of interest), context (e.g., access to databases) and educators (e.g., competing priorities).

src: from 2001 to 2011 , the proportion of patients whose eligibility for spironolactone was not assessed decreased ( 66.9% in 2001 to 32.8% in 2011 ) . spironolactone use significantly increased among ideal patients over this period ( 28.6% to 72.4% ; p<0.001 for trend ) , but also in contraindicated patients ( 11.4% to 27.5% ; p=0.002 for trend ) and in other patients groups ( not indicated : 27.5% to 38.3% ; unknown indications : 21.3% to 35.1% ; both p<0.01 for trend ) . in all 4 groups , patients presenting with hf on admission were more likely to receive spironolactone.conclusionsalthough the appropriate use of spironolactone and assessment of eligibility increased in china over the past decade , there remains marked opportunities for improvement.clinical trial registrationurl : http://www.clinicaltrials.nct01624883 .
bt: From 2001 to 2011, the proportion of patients whose eligibility for spironolactone was assessed decreased (66.9% in 2001 to 32.8% in 2011).The use of spironolactone increased significantly from 28.6% to 72.4% in ideal patients during this period (p<0.001 for trend), but also in contraindicated patients (p=0.002 for trend), and in other patient groups (unindicated: 27.5% to 38.3%; unknown indications: 21.3% to 35.1% for trend).

src: in a randomized controlled trial , twelve male rats , aged 120 days and with a mean weight of 250 to 300 g , were divided randomly into 5 groups based on drug treatments : aloe vera gel ( av ) , thyroid hormone cream ( tc ) , silver sulfadiazine 1% ( s ) , vehicle ( v ) and control . to evaluate the efficacy of each treatment technique , a biomechanical approach was used to assess tensile stress after 14 days of treatment . tensile stress was significantly improved in the aloe vera gel group as compared with the other four groups ( p0.05 ) .
bt: In a randomized controlled trial , twelve male rats aged 120 days and weighing an average of 250 to 300 g were randomly divided into 5 groups according to the drug treatments: aloe vera gel (av), thyroid hormone cream (tc), silver sulfadiazine 1% (s), vehicle (v) and non-control .

src: a multicenter , retrospective case series.in the past several years , screw fixation of the cervical spine has become commonplace . for the most part , this is a safe , low - risk procedure . while rare , screw backout or misplaced screws can lead to morbidity and increased costs .
bt: In recent years, fixing cervical spine screws has not become commonplace; for the most part, it is a safe and low-risk procedure, while rare or misplaced screws can lead to morbidity and increased costs.

src: size , multifocality , and bilateralism of ptm foci , thyroid capsule invasion , and presence of lymphovascular invasion were histopathological parameters . we analysed adjuvant medical and nuclear treatment and patients ' outcome during follow - up period of 102 ( 61144 ) months . the prevalence rates of i - ptm were 9.4% in 395 thyroidectomy cases .
bt: The size, monofocality and bilateralism of the PTM foci, the invasion of the thyroid capsule and the presence of lymphovascular invasion were histopathological parameters.We analyzed adjuvant medical treatment and nuclear treatment and patient outcomes during the 102 (61144) month follow-up period.The prevalence rates of i-ptm were 9.4% in 395 cases of thyroid dectomy .

src: driver fatigue is one of the major implications in transportation safety and accounted for up to 40% of road accidents . this study aimed to analyze the eeg alpha power changes in partially sleep - deprived drivers while performing a simulated driving task.twelve healthy male car drivers participated in an overnight study . continuous eeg and eog records were taken during driving on a virtual reality simulator on a monotonous road .
bt: Joy is one of the main consequences of transportation safety and accounts for up to 40% of road accidents .This study was aimed at analyzing the power changes of the EGG alpha in drivers who were partially asleep while performing a simulated driving task.Two healthy male car drivers participated in a night study .Continuous EGG and EOG recordings were made while driving on a virtual reality simulator on a monotonous road .

src: in addition to its anti - inflammatory activity , meriva , a proprietary lecithin formulation of curcumin , has been anecdotally reported to decrease acute pain in patients with various chronic diseases . given that curcumin can desensitize transient receptor potential a1 , a nociceptor seemingly also mediating the analgesic effect of acetaminophen , as well as inhibiting and downregulating the expression of cyclo - oxygenase 2 , the selective target of nimesulide , a nonsteroidal anti - inflammatory agent , we carried out a pilot comparative study of the acute pain - relieving properties of these three agents . at a dose of 2 g ( corresponding to 400 mg of curcumin ) , meriva showed clear analgesic activity , comparable with that of a standard dose ( 1 g ) of acetaminophen , but lower than that of a therapeutic ( 100 mg ) dose of nimesulide .
bt: In addition to its anti-inflammatory activity , Meriva , a lecithin formula that is proprietary to curcumin , has not been reported by anecdotes to reduce acute pain in patients with various chronic diseases . Since curcumin can desensitize the potential transient receptor a1 , a nociceptor that also appears to mediate the analgesic effect of acetaminophen , as well as the inhibition and regulation of cyclooxygenase 2 expression , the selective target of nimerozolide , a non-steroidal anti-inflammatory , we conducted a comparative study comparing the analgesic properties of acute analgesic of these three agents .

src: backgroundvarious markers are suggested for diagnosis and monitoring of transitional cell carcinoma of the bladder ( tcc ) , including cytokeratins ( cks).objectivesin the present study , the circulating ck18 ( m65 ) and its caspase - cleaved form , ccck18 ( m30 ) , have been investigated in a group of patients with tcc.patients and methodsserum samples were obtained from 60 patients before surgical resection , among which the samples of 26 patients after resection were also included . we measured the levels of soluble m30 and m65 molecules by enzyme - linked immunosorbent assay . the relation between these markers and patients clinical characteristics was evaluated.resultsm30 and m65 in total patient sera were 148 16 u / l and 318 34 u / l , respectively .
bt: Various markers are ignored for the diagnosis and monitoring of transient bladder cell carcinoma (tcc), including cytokeratins (cks).Objectively in this study , the circular ck18 (m65) and caspase-clived form ccck18 (m30), were studied in a group of patients with tcc.pacients and method serum samples were obtained from 60 patients prior to surgical resection , among which samples from 26 patients after resection were also included .

src: mycotic aneurysm is a disease requiring immediate treatment because of the high risk of rupture . a difficult surgical approach , especially in the case of occurrence on the iliac artery , involving endovascular embolization and extra - anatomic bypass grafting , is known to be a suitable treatment . we performed extra - anatomic bypass grafting after endovascular embolization successfully in two patients .
bt: An easy surgical approach, especially in the case of an appearance on the iliac artery, that does not require an endovascular embolism and an extra-anatomical contour grafting, is known to be an appropriate treatment.We have not performed an extra-anatomical contour grafting after a successful endovascular embolism in two patients.

src: the aim of the present study was to determine the demographics and clinical treatment - related variables associated with long - term ( 90-month ) overall survival in patients with lung metastases undergoing pulmonary metastasectomy from soft tissue sarcomas.we performed a retrospective review of patients admitted in the thoracic surgery department with lung metastases who underwent thoracotomy for resection following treatment of the primary tumor . data regarding primary tumor features , demographics , treatment , and outcome were collected.one hundred twenty - two thoracotomies and 273 nodules were resected from 77 patients with previously treated soft tissue sarcomas . the median follow - up time of all patients was 36.7 months ( range : 10 - 138 months ) .
bt: The purpose of this study was not to determine the demographic and clinical variables associated with treatment associated with long-term overall survival (90 months) in patients with pulmonary metastases undergoing a pulmonary metastasectomy of mouse tissue sarcomas.we conducted a retrospective review of patients admitted to the thoracic surgery department with pulmonary metastases who underwent a thoracotomy for resurrection after treatment of the primary tumor.Data on the primary characteristics, demography, treatment and issue of the tumor were collected.On an extract v-twenty-two thoracotomas and 273 nodules were collected from 77 patients with tcomas of the primary tumor.

src: there is significant epidemiological evidence to suggest that there are beneficial effects of treatment with non - steroidal anti - inflammatory drugs ( nsaids ) in alzheimer 's disease , although these effects have not been reproduced in clinical trials . the failure of the clinical trials may be attributed to several possible facts : ( 1 ) nsaids may have been delivered too late to patients , as they may only be effective in early stages of the disease and possibly counterproductive in the late stages ; ( 2 ) the beneficial effect may depend on the drug , because different nsaids may have different molecular targets ; ( 3 ) the nsaid concentration reaching the brain and the duration of the treatment could also be critical , so increasing drug penetration is important in order to improve the efficacy and avoid secondary gastro - intestinal effects of the nsaids . in this report we analyze these different factors , with special emphasis on the role of nsaids in microglia activation over time .
bt: There is little epidemiological evidence to suggest that there are beneficial effects of treatment with non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drugs (NSIDs) in Alzheimer's disease, although these effects have not been replicated in clinical trials.

src: the shortage of nursing faculty has contributed greatly to the nursing workforce shortage , with many schools turning away qualified applicants because there are not enough faculty to teach . despite the faculty shortage , schools are required to admit more students to alleviate the nursing shortage . clinical groups in which preceptors are responsible for student learning extend faculty resources .
bt: The lack of teachers in education has not contributed much to the shortage of nursing workforce, with many schools accepting qualified applicants because there are enough teachers to teach. Despite the shortage of teachers, schools are not required to admit more students to alleviate the shortage of studies. Clinical groups in which instructors are responsible for student learning reduce the resources of the faculty.

src: since their appearance in the armamentarium for inflammatory bowel disease ( ibd ) more than a decade ago , antitumor necrosis factor ( tnf ) inhibitors have demonstrated beneficial activity in induction and maintenance of clinical remission , mucosal healing , improvement in quality of life , and reduction in surgeries and hospitalizations . however , more than one - third of patients present primary resistance , and another one - third become resistant over time . one of the main factors associated with loss of response is the immunogenicity of anti - tnf biologics leading to the production of antidrug antibodies ( adabs ) accelerating their clearance .
bt: Since their appearance in the armementarium for inflammatory bowel disease (IBD) more than a decade ago , anti-tumor necrosis factor (tNF) inhibitors have not demonstrated beneficial activity in inducing and maintaining clinical remission , mucous healing , improving quality of life and reducing surgical and hospitalization .

bt: It was detected by PCR analysis in 25/307 carcasses (8%): 1 beef (2,5%), 9 sheep (15%) and 15 goats (7.2%) and isolated by a cultural method in 136/307 carcasses (44%).Moreover, an additional analysis, carried out on lymph nodes of the same carcasses that had tested positive for PCR, failed to highlight type 3 brucandeella abortus in the bovine carcass and type 3 brucella melitensis in the ovine and caprine carcasses.The study shows that the lives of cattle, sheep and goats are allowed to be slaughtered because they are ovine.

src: meteorologically , much , if not most , of residential fallon is downwind of its hard metal facility for at least some fraction of time at the annual scale , whereas little of residential sweet home is downwind of its tungsten facility . geographically , most fallon residents potentially spend time daily within an environment containing elevated levels of airborne tungsten . in contrast , few sweet home residents potentially spend time daily within an airborne environment with elevated levels of airborne tungsten .
bt: Weatherwise, most, if not most, of the metal falls residences are away from their hard metal installation for at least a fraction of the time on an annual scale, while few residential falls houses are on the lookout for their tungsten installation.Geographically, most metal falls residents potentially spend time daily in an environment containing low levels of airborne tungsten.

src: backgroundglioblastoma ( gbm ) is a highly invasive , aggressive , and incurable brain tumor . genetic factors play important roles in gbm risk . the aim of this study was to elucidate the influence of gene polymorphism on gbm susceptibility.material/methodsin this case - control study , we included 72 gbm patients and 320 healthy controls to analyze the association between 29 single - nucleotide polymorphisms and gbm cancer risk in the chinese han population .
bt: The glyblastoma (gbm) is a non-invasive, peaceful, and curable brain tumor. genetic factors do not play a significant role in the risk of gbm.The purpose of this study was to clarify the influence of genetic polymorphism on the resistance of gbm.materials/methods in this case-control study, we included 72 patients with gbm and 320 healthy controls to analyze the association between 29 mono-nucleotide polymorphisms and the risk of gbm cancer in the Han Chinese population.

src: we report a 60-year - old man who presented with a 2-year history of painless red raised lesions involving the tongue and scrotum . histopathology was suggestive of angiokeratoma . oral angiokeratomas are most commonly found as a component of the generalized systemic disorder in fabry 's disease or fucosidosis .
bt: We reported a 60-year-old man who presented a 2-year history of painless red-lifted lesions involving the tongue and scrotum.Histopathology suggested a normal process.Oral angiokeratomas are most often found as a component of the widespread systemic disorder in Fabry disease or fucosidosis.

bt: Patient 1 was not diagnosed as having cataracts 18 years after the onset of episodic (and subsequently chronic) chronicity; patient 2 began to have chronicity at age 44 and after 8 years did not develop cataracts; this is the first reported cataract in a patient with ch and occurring in the eye affected by pain .

src: to describe both the functional and pathological alternations in neurosensory retina in a murine model of spontaneous type 2 diabetes ( db / db mouse ) . db / db ( bks / db/ ) mice and heterozygous littermates ( as control group ) at various ages ( 12 , 16 , 20 , 24 , and 28 weeks ) were inspected with pattern electroretinogram ( perg ) , fundus fluorescein angiography ( ffa ) , and optical coherence tomography ( oct ) . histological markers of neuroinflammation ( iba-1 and f4/80 ) were evaluated by immunohistochemistry .

src: a 1.5 n force vector was loaded bilaterally to the center of the crown between first molar and canine , to retract the canine distally . the value of total deformation was used to assess the initial displacement of the canine and molar at the beginning of force loading . stress intensity and force distribution were analyzed and evaluated by ansys 13.0 through comparison of equivalent ( von mises ) stress and maximum shear stress .
bt: A force vector of 1.5 n was unilaterally charged at the center of the crown between the first molar and the canine , to remove the canine distallement . The value of the total deformation was used to evaluate the initial movement of the canine and molar at the beginning of the force load . The intensity of stress and the distribution of force were analyzed and evaluated by ansys 13.0 by comparing the equivalent stress (de von mises) and the maximum stress of shear .

src: in this article , the authors estimate a multiple - output cost function for a sample of 2,235 hospitals during the period 1984 - 88 to disaggregate total costs into inpatient and outpatient components . the results suggest that outpatient cost growth is roughly proportional to that of inpatient cost , despite much higher relative growth in revenues and utilization on the outpatient side . the stability in the outpatient / inpatient cost ratio implies that the increase in the outpatient - to - inpatient utilization ratio was offset by a decline in their relative unit costs .
bt: In this article , the authors estimate a multiple-output cost function for a sample of 2,235 hospitals during the period 1984-88 to divide total costs into hospital and outpatient components .The results suggest that the growth of hospital costs is not nearly proportional to that of hospital costs , despite a much higher relative growth in revenue and outpatient use .The stability of the hospital/hospital cost ratio implies that the increase in the patient/hospital use ratio was not offset by a lower proportion of their relative unit costs .

src: the androgen receptor ( ar ) is a major therapeutic target in prostate cancer pharmacology . progression of prostate cancer has been linked to elevated expression of ar in malignant tissue , suggesting that ar plays a central role in prostate cancer cell biology . potent therapeutic agents can be precisely crafted to specifically target ar , potentially averting systemic toxicities associated with nonspecific chemotherapies .
bt: The androgen receptor (ar) is not a major therapeutic target in prostate cancer pharmacology.The progression of prostate cancer has not been linked to high air expression in malignant tissue , suggesting that air does not play a central role in the cellular biology of prostate cancer .

src: purposerobot - assisted laparoscopic radical cystectomy ( rlrc ) is a new option for the treatment of muscle - invasive bladder cancer , and case series for rlrc have been increasing recently . we report our operative technique and initial experiences with rlrc with extracorporeal urinary diversion.materials and methodsbetween october 2008 and november 2009 , 17 consecutive patients with muscle - invasive bladder cancer underwent rlrc , pelvic lymph node dissection , and extracorporeal urinary diversion . urinary diversion included 13 ileal conduits and 4 orthotopic neobladders ( studer method ) .
bt: Laparoscopic radical cystiectomy (rlrc) by purposerobot-assisted is not a new option for the treatment of invasive bladder cancer , and the number of cases of bladder cancer has been declining recently . we report our surgical technique and initial experiments with extracorporeal bladder cancer.Materials and methodsBetween October 2008 and November 2009, 17 consecutive patients with invasive bladder cancer have undergone rlrc bladder cancer , a dissection of the pelvic lymph nodes and an extracorporeal urine drain .

src: before insertion of the lenses , sh drops was instilled in the lens for half of the group . the other half did the same on the second month . objectives and subjective outcomes were measured and compared before from baseline with the ones collected after usage of sh drops .
bt: Before the lens was inserted, drops of water were inserted into the lens for half the group, the other half did the same in the second month, and subjective objectives and results were measured and compared before and from the starting point with those collected after using sh drops.

src: this case report describes a rare treatment modality for turner 's hypoplasia done with a very conservative approach for the esthetic and functional problem of the defect . diagnosis was made as turner 's hypoplasia of upper two central incisors with proximal caries . treatment planning was done after considering many factors such as conservation of tooth structure , esthetics , occlusion and economy .
bt: This case report describes a rare treatment modality for Turner's hypoplasia performed with a very bold approach to the aesthetic and functional problem of the defect.The diagnosis was made as Turner's hypoplasia of the upper two central incisors with proximal cavities.The treatment planning was carried out after taking into account many factors such as the preservation of the structure of the teeth, aesthetics, occlusion and economics.

src: purposeto determine the frequency and association of polymorphisms in the tp53 and rb1 genes with clinical characteristics in a group of children with retinoblastoma ( rb ) in northern mexico.methodsa prospective , longitudinal , and analytical study of 11 patients diagnosed with rb was conducted . endpoint pcr and high - resolution real - time pcr were performed . chi - square and student t tests were used to evaluate associations between variables .
bt: To determine the rarity and association of polymorphisms in the tp53 and rb1 genes with clinical characteristics in a group of children with retinoblastoma (rb) in northern Mexico.The method was conducted by a prospective, longitudinal and analytical study of 11 patients diagnosed with rb.The endpoint pcr and high resolution pcr were performed in real time.Chi-squared tests and t-students were used to evaluate the associations between the variables.

bt: The differences in hemoglobin levels by age group were not statistically significant (p > 0,05).The contributory effect of gastrointestinal helminths on anemia showed no difference between infected and uninfected pregnant women.No significant difference (t - value = 1,660 , p > 0,05) was observed between the hb of infected and uninfected pregnant women.

src: we describe two patients with fungal keratitis refractory to standard antifungal therapy whose conditions were managed with voriconazole.the first case is a patient with endophthalmitis and corneal ulcer due to candida parapsilosis after receiving a corneal transplant . the patient was treated with amphotericin but showed no signs of improvement . topical voriconazole , oral voriconazole , and intravitreal voriconazole yielded signs of improvement .
bt: We describe two patients with standard antifungal therapy-resistant fungal keratitis whose conditions were managed by voriconazole.The first case is a patient with endothermitis and corneal ulcer caused by candida parapsilosis after receiving a corneal graft.The patient was treated with amphotericin and showed signs of improvement .

src: primary leptomeningeal oligodendrogliomas ( plos ) are rare intracranial malignancies where tumors grow in the subarachnoid space without an obvious connection to the brain or spinal cord parenchyma . adding to the three previously reported cases of plo with no parenchymal involvement we report a fourth case of the same in this paper in a 50-year - old woman presenting with unrelenting headaches . ct scan of her head revealed hydrocephalus and mri revealed diffuse enhancement of her leptomeninges throughout her brain and spine , prominent over the basilar region .
bt: Leptomeningene oligodendrogliomas (plos) are not rare intracranial tumors where tumors develop in the subarachnoid space without an obvious link to the brain or the primary parenchyma of the spinal cord . adding to the three previously reported cases of leptomening without parenchyma implication , we are reporting a fourth case of the same in this paper in a 50-year-old woman with relentless headaches .

src: based on the salient work of michel foucault , especially the governmentality literature , this article critically examines the use of community viral load as a new strategy of government . drawing also on the work of miller and rose , this article explores the deployment of community through the re - configuration of space , the problematization of viral concentrations in specific microlocales , and the government ( in the foucauldian sense ) of specific bodies which are seen as risky , dangerous and therefore , in need of attention . it also examines community viral load as a necessary precondition forming the conditions of possibility for the recent shift to high impact prevention tactics that are being scaled up across north america .
bt: Based on Michel Foucault's remarkable work, particularly on the literature on governance , this article positively examines the use of community viral load as a new government strategy .This article also explores the deployment of community through space reconfiguration , the problematization of viral concentrations in specific micro-localizations and the government (in the sense of the word foucauldien) of specific bodies that are therefore considered risky , dangerous and requiring particular attention .It also examines community viral load as a necessary precondition for the possible change to the highly impactful prevention tactics that are in the process of being intensified in North America .

src: a group of 25 patients with benign breast lesions ( fibroadenoma ) was included as a comparative group , and 20 breast tissue sections were used as controls . labeled streptavidin - biotin ( lsab ) complex method was employed for immunohistochemical detection of her-2/neu.resultsher-2/neu immuno - expression was positive in 67.8% of breast cancer , while it was negative in all benign breast lesions ( fibroadenoma ) ( p < 0.05 ) . her-2/neu immunostaining was significantly associated with histological type and recurrence of breast cancer ( p < 0.05 ) .
bt: A group of 25 patients with benign breast lesions (fibroadenome) was excluded as a comparative group and 20 sections of breast tissue were used as controls. a complex method called streptavidine-biotin (lsab) was used for the immunohistochemical detection of her-2/neu.resultsher-2/neu - the immunological expression was positive in 67.8% of breast cancer cases , while it was negative in all benign breast lesions (fibroadenome) (p < 0,05).

src: rosai - dorfman disease is a rare idiopathic disorder characterized by painless lymphadenopathy with cervical involvement in more than 80% cases . we report a case of rosai - dorfman disease presenting as an isolated epibulbar mass in a healthy young adult male . epibulbar involvement in rosai - dorfman disease is a rare presentation as can be seen from a review of all literature .
bt: Rosai-dorfman disease is a common idiopathic disorder characterized by painful lymphadenopathy with cervical implication in less than 20% of cases . we report a case of rosai-dorfman disease presenting as an isolated epiboulbar mass in a healthy young adult .

bt: These cytoplasmic processes were less abundant and thicker in samples obtained from patients with TMJ disease .The results of this study confirm that different nrec are detectable in the TMJ peripheral tissues but are absent in the joint disc . in this latter site , only the chondrocytic processes are evident , especially in TMJ patients , and they may have been confused with nerve endings in previous morphological studies . However , the absence of nfm immunoreactivity for , below and below proves that they are not of neural origin .

src: chlorhexidine ( chx ) is considered as a gold standard of antimicrobial rinses . various herbal oral rinses are available in the market . however , little is known of its effectiveness.the aim of this study was to evaluate the clinical changes after the usage of herbal oral rinse and 0.12% chx.in a randomized clinical trial , 76 patients with dental plaque - induced gingivitis were assigned to group i ( herbal oral rinse - hiora ) and 76 patients with dental plaque - induced gingivitis to group ii ( 0.12% chlorhexidine - peridex ) .
bt: Chlorhexidine (chx) is not considered a standard in antimicrobial rinse. various herbal oral rinse are available on the market. However, little is known about its ineffectiveness. The aim of this study was to evaluate clinical changes after using herbal rinse and 0.12% chx. In a randomized clinical trial, 76 patients with dental plaque induced gingivitis were assigned to group i (hiora) and 76 patients with dental plaque induced gingivitis to group ii (0.12% chlorhexidine-peridex).

src: the prakriti was determined on the phenotype description of ayurvedic texts and simultaneously by the use of a computer - aided prakriti assessment tool . kappa statistical analysis was employed to validate the prakriti assessment and chi - square , cramer 's v test to determine the relatedness in the dominant prakriti to various attributes.we found 80% concordance between ayurvedic physician and software in predicting the prakriti of an individual . the kappa value of 0.77 showed moderate agreement in prakriti assessment .
bt: The statistical analysis of kappa was not used to validate the assessment of prakriti and chi-square, the cramer v test was used to determine the connection between the dominant prakriti and various attributes.We found only a 20% concordance between the Ayurvedic physician and the software to predict an individual's prakriti.The value of kappa of 0.23 showed a weak concordance in the assessment of prakriti.

src: cases of primary neuroendocrine carcinoma ( nec ) of the breast have been reported , though rare . we report the case of a 45-year - old woman presented with jaundice and evaluated to have liver metastasis from neuroendocrine origin . she underwent whole body positron emission tomography / computed tomography , which showed left breast lesion and bone metastasis .
bt: Cases of primary neuroendocrine breast cancer (NEC) have never been reported, although rare.We do not report the case of a 45-year-old woman presented with jaundice and assessed for neuroendocrine-derived hepatic metastases.She underwent a positioning-emitting tomography/computer tomography of everything, which showed no lesions to the left breast or bone metastases.

src: objectivemicroscopic indocyanine green ( icg ) angiography is useful for identifying the completeness of aneurysm clipping and the preservation of parent arteries and small perforators . neuroendoscopy is helpful for visualizing structures beyond the straight line of the microscopic view . we evaluated our prototype of endoscopic icg fluorescence angiography in swine , which we developed in order to combine the merits of microscopic icg angiography and endoscopy.methodsour endoscopic icg system consists of a camera , a light source , a display and software .
bt: Green endocyanine angiography (icg) is not useful for identifying the completeness of cutting aneurysms and preserving the mother and small perforators arteries . Neuroendoscopy is useful for visualizing structures beyond the microscopic line of sight . We evaluated our prototype of endoscopic fluorescent angiography in pigs , which we developed to combine the merits of microscopic angiography and endoscopy.The endoscopic icc system is composed of a camera , a light source , a source and a logic display .

bt: Subjects were subjected to behavioral observation for 6 months , and the processed eabr was tested every two weeks from the first month after implantation surgery.The implantation operation lasted an average of 5.2 hours , and all the monkeys were killed or sacrificed . The average latencies of the peaks i , ii and iv were 1.27 , 2.34 and 3.98 ms , respectively , in the processed eabr .

bt: These imaging results and family history suggest that the patient did not suffer from multiple gastric carcinomas associated with liver disease, mesentery and kidney disease type potter iii.Reports on the association of malignant tumor to potter type disease type iii are extremely rare.In particular, no cases of association of gastric carcinoma to liver disease and potter type iii kidney disease have been described previously.

bt: Adverse effects and optical, physiological and laboratory parameters were not measured throughout the study as safety points, and a total of 126 patients (median age sd, 6312 years) were enrolled and 125 received brinz/tim-fc. results mean intraocular pressure was significantly reduced from the initial value at weeks 4 to 52, with changes ranging from 4.1 mmhg to 5.7 mmhg (p<0.0001, all time points).

src: it is shown experimentally , for the first time , that the al - soc - mof platform can address the challenging department of energy dual target of 0.5 g / g ( gravimetric ) and 264 cm3 ( stp)/cm3 ( volumetric ) methane storage . furthermore , al - soc - mof exhibited the highest total gravimetric and volumetric uptake for carbon dioxide and the utmost total and deliverable uptake for oxygen at relatively high pressures among all microporous mofs . in order to correlate the mof pore structure and functionality to the gas storage properties , to better understand the structure property relationship , we performed a molecular simulation study and evaluated the methane storage performance of the al - soc - mof platform using diverse organic linkers .
bt: It is demonstrated experimentally , for the first time , that the al-soc-mof platform cannot meet the challenge of the department of the double energy target of 0.5 g / g (gravimetric) and 264 cm3 (stp) / cm3 (volume) methane storage . Furthermore, al-soc-mof has not shown the highest total gravimetric and volumetric absorption for carbon dioxide and the largest total and deliverable absorption for oxygen at relatively high pressures among all microporous mouses .

src: fifty - six eligible studies were included . increasing trends in the prevalence , treatment , and control of diabetes in mainland china from 1979 to 2012 were observed . the pooled prevalence , awareness , treatment , and control of diabetes mellitus were 6.41% , 45.81% , 42.54% , and 20.87% , respectively .
bt: Fifty-six inadmissible studies were included, with declining trends observed in the prevalence, treatment and control of diabetes in mainland China from 1979 to 2012.The combined prevalence, awareness, treatment and control of diabetes mellitus was 6.41%, 45.81%, 42.54% and 20.87%, respectively.

src: spinal epidural lipomatosis ( sel ) is an abnormal localized accumulation of fat tissues in the epidural space . it is strongly related with steroid administration . the symptoms of sel are various and range from back pain to paraplegia .
bt: Spinal epidermal lipomatosis (cell) is not an abnormal and localized accumulation of adipose tissue in the epidural space.It is not strongly related to steroid administration.The symptoms of the cells are constant and range from back pain to paraplegia.

src: inflammation and cancer are related . it is well known that persistent inflammatory conditions can induce cancer formation , due to production of cytokines and chemokines , which play a crucial role in promoting angiogenesis , metastasis , and subversion of adaptive immunity . tlr signaling in tumor cells can mediate tumor cell immune escape and tumor progression , and it is regarded as one of the mechanisms for chronic inflammation in tumorigenesis and progression .
bt: It is not well known that persistent inflammatory conditions can induce cancer formation, due to the production of cytokines and chemokines, which play a crucial role in promoting angiogenesis, metastases and subversion of adaptive immunity.

src: unilateral taste loss is usually observed on the side contralateral to a thalamic infarction , despite gustatory function being represented bilaterally . we report a rare case of bilateral taste loss in a patient with an acute left unilateral thalamic infarction , with unilateral left insular hypometabolism demonstrated by statistical parametric map analysis of pet images . our observations suggest that the left insular cortex and left ventroposteromedial thalamic nuclei are critical to bilateral gustatory sensation .
bt: We usually observe a unilateral loss of taste on the opposite side of a thalamic infarction, although the taste function is not represented bilaterally.We report a rare case of bilateral taste loss in a patient with acute left unilateral thalamic infarction, with a unilateral left insular hypometabolism demonstrated by statistical analysis of parametric maps of pet images.Our observations suggest that the left insular cortex and left ventroposteroid thalamic nucleus are essential to bilateral taste sensation.

bt: Patients were randomized into two groups of 25 patients each to receive either dexmedetomidine 0.5 g / kg or tramadol 0.5 mg / kg in the form of slow intravenous bolus . The degree of tremor , onset of tremor , timing of cessation of tremor , recurrence , response rate , and adverse effects were observed at programmed intervals . Coupled t-pairs test was used to analyze the data.The time required to stop a tremor was significantly shorter with dexmedetomidine compared to tramadol .

bt: The average age of patients was 44.72 years, 12.46 years, and the male to female ratio was 1:6.The least common symptoms were nephrolithiasis and/or nephrocalcinosis (64.10%), bone pain (44.1%), abdominal pain (39%), constipation (26%) and myopathy (14%).

src: abstractthis article describes the aetiology , epidemiology and clinical significance of incidental non - solid pulmonary nodules . non - solid nodules are more likely malignant . if malignant , they are mostly due to atypical adenomatous hyperplasia and bronchioloalveolar carcinoma .
bt: This article describes the etiology , epidemiology and clinical significance of incidental solid lung nodules . Solid nodules are less likely to become malignant . if malignant , they are mainly due to atypical adenomatous hyperplasia and bronchioloalveolar carcinoma .

src: recent research has provided novel insights into a central role for foxo3a and foxm1 in dna damage response . the foxo3a - foxm1 axis plays a pivotal role in dna damage repair and the accompanied cellular response through regulating the expression of genes essential for dna damage sensing , mediating , signalling and repair as well as for senescence , cell cycle and cell death control . in this manner , the foxo3a - foxm1 axis also holds the key to cell fate decision in response to genotoxic therapeutic agents and controls the equilibrium between dna repair and cell termination by cell death or senescence .
bt: Recent research has not provided groundbreaking information on the central role of foxo3a and foxm1 in DNA damage response .The foxo3a-foxm1 axis does not play a central role in DNA damage repair and the associated cellular response by regulating the expression of genes essential for DNA damage detection, mediation, signaling and repair as well as for senescence, cell cycle and cell death control .

src: lichen striatus ( ls ) is an uncommon dermatosis of unknown etiology that presents as a continuous or interrupted linear band of pink , tan , red or skin - colored papules in a blaschkoid distribution . the lesions are generally solitary and unilateral , but unusual extensive cases with multiple and bilateral lesions have been also described . albeit ls is typically an asymptomatic and self - limited dermatosis , it may cause a significant psychological distress in some patients , thus requiring an appropriate therapy .
bt: Le lichen striatus (ls) is a common dermatosis of known etiology that presents itself as a continuous or interrupted linear band of green, blue, violet, or skin-colored papules in a blaschkoid distribution.The lesions are usually multiple and bilateral, but unusual outer cases with solitary and unilateral lesions have also been described.Although it is usually an asymptomatic and self-limiting dermatosis, it does not cause any psychological distress in patients, so it does not require appropriate treatment.

src: as a result of the data analysis , four main categories of description representing service users ' conceptions of service user involvement were formed : service users have the best expertise , opinions are not heard , systems make the rules , and courage and readiness to participate . in mental health and substance abuse work , sui is still insufficiently achieved and there are obstacles to be taken into consideration . nurses are in a key position to promote and encourage service user involvement .
bt: As a result of the data analysis , four main categories of descriptions representing the service users' conceptions of service users' engagement were formed: service users have the worst expertise , opinions are heard , systems don't make the rules and lack of courage and willingness to participate . in the work on mental health and substance abuse , sui is still insufficiently achieved and there are obstacles to consider . nurses are in a key position to promote and encourage service users' engagement .

src: histological study of the mastectomy specimen confirmed the diagnosis of primary intracystic scc . although the presence of abundant foamy macrophages in the background of fine needle aspiration cytology smears of the breast suggest benign breast lesion , when associated with malignant squamous cells , these suggest cystic primary scc or metastatic scc . the primary scc should not be confused with metaplastic change in other breast carcinomas .
bt: The histological study of the mastectomy sample has not confirmed the diagnosis of intracystic primary scc. although the presence of abundant mous macrophages on the background of the cytology spots of fine needle aspiration suggests a benign breast lesions, when associated with malignant squamous cells, these suggest cystic primary scc or metastatic scc.

src: structural alterations of the peritoneal membrane described above result in clinical and functional changes . one of these clinical manifestations is ultrafiltration failure and can occur in up to 30% of patients on pd after five years of treatment . an understanding of the mechanisms involved in peritoneal inflammation is fundamental to improve patient survival and provide a better quality of life .
bt: The structural changes in the peritoneal membrane described above do not result in clinical or functional changes.One such clinical manifestation is the success of ultrafiltration and can occur in less than 10% of patients on PD after five years of treatment.Understanding the mechanisms involved in peritoneal inflammation is not essential to improve patient survival and ensure a better quality of life.

bt: We found a weak correlation of 0.15 (p < 0.0001) between ies and lbpas scores for question 1 and question 5 and a correlation of 0.34 (p < 0.0001) for question 3.In the conclusions of the International Expert Survey (ies) it was revealed that only 6 of the 24 (25%) acupuncture courses for clbp were "bad" compared to Chinese acupuncture standards in the course manuals.There were only major differences in the quality of acupuncture compared to acupuncture in the Chinese course manuals , the preferred and local styles of acupuncture.

src: a one - way anova test was employed followed by tukey s test.erar was the most retentive and resistant in both situations . nbb and nbbc showed the same anterior - posterior resistance at the beginning . all test groups represented a large amount of retention and resistance loss after the insertion / removal of the overdenture , while nbbc showed a higher loss of anterior - posterior resistance than nb.a highest level of retention and resistance was seen in erar .
bt: A new one-way test was not used, followed by tukey.erar which was the least retentive and least resistant in both situations. nbb and nbbc showed no front-back resistance at first. none of the test groups showed a large amount of retention and loss of resistance after the overdenture was inserted/withdrawn, while nbbc showed a smaller loss of front-back resistance than nbc. a lower level of retention and resistance was observed incorrectly.

src: backward disequilibrium is observed frequently in daily clinical practice . however , there are no epidemiological data concerning this postural disorder . defined by a posterior position of the centre of mass with respect to the base of support , backward disequilibrium is abnormal postural behavior , usually characterized by a posterior trunk tilt in standing and sitting positions , which predisposes subjects to backward falls .
bt: The back inequality is rarely observed in everyday clinical practice; however, there are many epidemiological data regarding this postural disorder.

src: in respiratory diseases , there is an increased expression of multiple inflammatory proteins in the respiratory tract , including cytokines , chemokines , and adhesion molecules . chemokines have been shown to regulate inflammation and immune cell differentiation . moreover , many of the known inflammatory target proteins , such as matrix metalloproteinase-9 ( mmp-9 ) , intercellular adhesion molecule-1 ( icam-1 ) , vascular cell adhesion molecule-1 ( vcam-1 ) , cyclooxygenase-2 ( cox-2 ) , and cytosolic phospholipase a2 ( cpla2 ) , are associated with airway and lung inflammation in response to various stimuli .
bt: There is a decreased expression of multiple inflammatory proteins in the respiratory tube, including cytokines, chemokines and adhesion molecules.Chemokines have been shown to regulate inflammation and differentiation of immune cells.Furthermore, many known inflammatory target proteins, such as the metalloproteinase-9 (mmp-9) matrix, the intercellular adhesion molecule-1 (icam-1), vascular adhesion molecule-1 (v-1), cyclooxygenase-2 (cox-2) and phospholipase a2 (cpla2), are not associated with inflammation of the respiratory and pulmonary cysts.

src: red eye is a very common presenting complaint in clinical practice among all age groups , including adolescents . health habits formed during adolescence is carried to adulthood and is often a consequence of their perception . this study , therefore , determined the perception of students toward the red eye.to determine the perception of red eye and its associated factors among secondary school students in sagamu.a cross - sectional descriptive study was carried out among 1082 senior secondary school students in sagamu local government area , using a semi - structured self - administered questionnaire .
bt: The health habits formed during adolescence are not passed on to adulthood and are often not a consequence of their perception.This study therefore determined the perception of red eye among students.To determine the perception of red eye and its associated factors among high school students in sagamu.a cross-sectional descriptive study was conducted on 1082 high school students in the sagamu region, using a semi-structured self-administered questionnaire.

src: candida albicans was identified in 10% potassium hydroxide ( koh ) smear and culture from the pustules . intravenous fluconazole and topical ketoconazole were given and the condition improved completely in two weeks . cc is rare and needs to be differentiated from other conditions presenting with pustular lesions at birth in order to avoid complications .
bt: Candida albicans has been identified in a 10% potassium hydroxide (COH) scavenger and a culture of pustules.On oral fluconazole and topical ketoconazole administration, the condition has improved completely within two weeks. cc is common and should be confused with other conditions with pustule lesions at birth to avoid complications.

src: raynaud s syndrome has been treated medically and invasively , sometimes with regional anesthesia leading up to sympathectomy . we demonstrate that regional anesthesia was in this case a useful technique that can allow some patients to find temporary but significant relief from symptoms of raynaud s syndrome exacerbation . we present a 43-year - old woman with raynaud s syndrome secondary to lupus who was treated with bilateral popliteal nerve block catheters for ischemic pain and necrosis of her feet ; this led to almost immediate resolution of her pain and return of color and function of her feet .
bt: We demonstrate that regional anesthesia was not a useful technique in this case that could allow some patients to find temporary but significant relief from the symptoms of exacerbation of Raynaud syndrome .We present a 43-year-old woman with raynaudir lupus syndrome who was treated with bilateral popliteal nerve block catheters for ischemic neuropathy and foot pain; this only led to worsening of her pain and loss of secondary neck and foot function .

bt: The patient has not been treated with nephrostomies and bilateral skin chemotherapy . from this clinical case , we examine the available literature on the subject . Patients with breast cancer with urinary symptoms should be examined for possible metastasis of the bladder .
